T07abhisdhu:0: Explanatory Remarks The present text is edited to facilitate word-searches. The text is based on the manuscript of the transliteration of the AbhisamAcArika-Dharma of the MahAsAGghika-LokottaravAdins. Grammatical errors and the like have
T07abhisdhu:1: been left uncorrected, but preferred readings are occasionally given for conspicuous scribal
T07abhisdhu:2: The symbols and editorial features are as follows:
T07abhisdhu:3: (1) The letters between ( ) indicate that they should be supplied.
T07abhisdhu:4: (2) The letters which seem to be wrongly written are underlined.
T07abhisdhu:5: Immediately after them suggestion is supplied between ( ).
T07abhisdhu:6: (3) Letters in blue and underlined are to be omitted. No suggestion is
T07abhisdhu:7: supplied after them. This applies to the omission of the virAma.
T07abhisdhu:8: (4) The letters between [ ] indicate that they are obscure.
T07abhisdhu:9: (5) An illegible character (akXaras) is indicated by one "+".
T07abhisdhu:10: (6) Symbols which seem to indicate virama are substituted by comma (" ,
T07abhisdhu:11: (7) Symbols which seem to be SiddhaM, etc., are substituted by " * ".
T07abhisdhu:12: (8) Cancellations in the Ms. are not indicated.
T07abhisdhu:13: (9) J. refers to the Jinananda edition.
T07abhisdhu:14: (10) Compounds in which hiatus appears are hyphened.

T07abhisdhu:395: vihāraśū(5a4)nyaṃ śakyaṃ karttuṃ ti laghu kālo atikramati /
T07abhisdhu:396: detha yūyan ti atha dāni grīṣmo vā varṣā vā rātro vā kālo bhavati cirehi kālo atikramati /
T07abhisdhu:399: kiṃ ārabhya deti tathā yeca(va) nimantraṇāpetavyaṃ bhojanaṃ dīyati
T07abhisdhu:405: nahi āryasya etaṃ evaṃ dīyati vaktavyaṃ /

T07abhisdhu:425: kim ālambanaṃ bhaktaṃ jātakaṃ mṛtakam vā ce(ve)vāhikam vā gṛhapraveśakam vā āgantukasya gamikasya gṛhasthasya pravrajitasyeti /
T07abhisdhu:428: ayaṃ kumāro śivapathikāya cchandito aṅguṣṭhasnehena yāpaye saptarātraṃ śunakhā śṛgālā ca naṃ laṃghayantu /
T07abhisdhu:432: ayaṃ kumāro śaraṇaṃ upetu buddhaṃ vipaśyiñ ca śikhi(ñ) ca viśvabhuṃ krakucchanda konākamuniñ ca kāśyapaṃ mahāyaśaṃ śākyamuniñ ca gautamaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:435: tā naṃ rakṣaṃtu tā ca naṃ pālayantu yathā naṃ icchati mātā yathā naṃ icchati pitā ato śreyataro bhotu kumāro kulavarddhano /
T07abhisdhu:439: evaṃ dakṣiṇā ādiśituṃ adya te sudivasaṃ sumahābalaṃ bhadrakākṣaṇa muhūrttaṃ prasthitā adya te suvihite suvihitehi /
T07abhisdhu:446: apare mārggam bhāvayitvā parinirvvānti anāśravā iti //
T07abhisdhu:450: nagnā nadī anodikā nagnaṃ rāṣṭraṃ arājakaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:451: istrī pi vidhavā nagnā sacesyā daśa bhrātaro
T07abhisdhu:454: istri pi peśalā bhavatu śrāddhā bhavatu pativratānugā śīlavatī yo(tyā)gasampannā samyagdṛṣṭi ca yā iha /
T07abhisdhu:455: puruṣo pi peśalā bhavatu śrāddho bhavatu vratā(5b5)nugo /
T07abhisdhu:456: śīlavāṃ tyāgasampanno samyagdṛṣṭi ca yo iha //
T07abhisdhu:457: ubhau śraddhāya sampannā ubhau śīlo(le)hi saṃvṛtā /

T07abhisdhu:468: evam ādīpite loke mṛtyunā ca jarayā ca yo nīharati /
T07abhisdhu:471: atha khalu dakṣiṇā ādiśitavyā vibhaktabhāgaṃ ruciraṃ manoramaṃ
T07abhisdhu:473: praviśya vṛddhiye varāye bhūrīye śirīye lakṣmīparigraheṇa ca /

T07abhisdhu:493: (I.p.57) devabhāvaṃ vā manuṣyam vā pañcadho (6a3) manasi prīyanti /

T07abhisdhu:511: ārya kiṃ samagro bhikṣusaṃgho bhikṣū āhaṃsu /

T07abhisdhu:514: paśyatha bhaṇe vayaṃ yeva bhā(tā)va karmmāntāṃ cchoriya āgacchāma
T07abhisdhu:516: āryamiśrāṇāñ ca pādāṃ vandiṣyāmaḥ (6a6) dvitīyasthaviro nāgacchati /
T07abhisdhu:520: munti(tti)kā // etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:522: śabdāpayatha upanandanaṃ so dāni śabdāpito bhagavān āha /

T07abhisdhu:527: ārya kiṃ samagro bhikṣusaṃgho bhikṣū āhaṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:528: nahi ko khalu nāgacchati dvitīyasthaviro nāgacchati /
T07abhisdhu:540: tena hi evaṃ dvitīyasthavireṇa bhaktāgre pratipadyitavyaṃ /

T07abhisdhu:542: eṣo dāni koci bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhaktena nimantrayati /
T07abhisdhu:547: bhikṣubhikṣunī upāsakopāsikā āga(6b2)ntuko gamiko vāṇijako sārthavāho kin nāmako kiṃ jātiko kiṃ karmmikā se mātāpitarau
T07abhisdhu:548: katamasmin deśe gṛhaṃ katamāyāṃ rathyāyāṃ kuto mukhaṃ gṛhasya dvāraṃ /
T07abhisdhu:552: yadi tāva saṃghasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati dvitīyasthavireṇa aparejjukāye ca māsacā(6b3)riko vā pakṣacāriko /
T07abhisdhu:554: asuke deśe asukāyāṃ rathyāyāṃ itthaṃnāmo nāma upāsako tena bhikṣusaṃgho nimantrito jānāhi kiṃ sidhyati kiṃ pacyati /
T07abhisdhu:556: ārogyaṃ dīrghāyu koci imaṃhi itthaṃnāmo nāma upāsako āha bhante kiṃ kariṣyasi /
T07abhisdhu:559: bhikṣusaṃ,(6b4)gho bhaktena nimantrito kiṃ sidhyati vā kiṃ pacyati vā ti /
T07abhisdhu:561: bhante kisya upāsako kahiṃ upāsako ti nāmāsmākaṃ koci upāsako na sidhyati /
T07abhisdhu:562: na pacyati tti jānitavyaṃ vipralabdho bhikṣusaṃgho ti /
T07abhisdhu:569: āyuṣma(n)to vipralabdho bhikṣusaṃgho svakasvakāṃ vṛttiṃ paryeṣatheti /
T07abhisdhu:571: atha dāni āha bhante etaṃ sidhyati etaṃ pacyati /
T07abhisdhu:572: praviśantu āryamiśrāḥ raṇaraṇāya gaṇḍiṃ āhaṇiyāṇaṃ praviśitavyaṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:573: (I.p.59) yadi tāva hemantakālo bhava(6b6)ti anukallatarakam praviśitavyam /
T07abhisdhu:579: tato nāpi kṣamati bhaṇḍaṃ laṃghaṃyantehi praviśituṃ /

T07abhisdhu:602: atha dāni saṃghasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati dvitīyasthaviro pratibalo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:606: yaṃ kālaṃ navakā bhikṣū u(pa)grāyanti vā pānīyam vā pibanti hastāni okaḍhiya āsanti tato yadi tāva saṃghasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:610: vevāhikaṃ gharapraveśakaṃ āgantukasya gamikasya gṛhasthasya pravrajitasyeti /
T07abhisdhu:613: yathā prathamake śikṣāpade evaṃ dvitīyasthavireṇa bhaktāgre
T07abhisdhu:622: śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā saṃghasya dāni bāhirakaṃ bhaktaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:623: āyuṣman nandano saṃghasthaviro āyuṣmān upanandano dvitīyasthaviro saṃghasthaviro āgato dvitīyasthaviro āgato bhikṣū osarantikāye āgacchanti /

T07abhisdhu:629: vayam eva tāva karmmāntāṃ cchoraya āgatā gacchāmaḥ samagraṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pariviśiṣyāmaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:633: asmākaṃ bhagavān daṇḍakarmman deti // imeṣāṃ muktikā /

T07abhisdhu:642: bhikṣū āhaṃsu nohīdaṃ dīrghāyu ko dāni na(nā)gacchati bhikṣū osarantikāye āgacchanti /
T07abhisdhu:643: te dāni odhyāyanti vayam eva tāva karmmāntā cchoriya āgatā gacchāma /
T07abhisdhu:653: tena hi sarvvehi evaṃ bhaktāgre pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:654: kin ti dāni evaṃ sarvvehi bhaktāgre pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:657: saṃghasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati dvitīyasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati /

T07abhisdhu:668: atha khalu yadi tāva saṃghasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:669: dvitīyasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati yo pratibalas tena prakṛtyeva māsacāriko vā pakṣacāriko vā preṣayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:670: anekāye tahiṃ jātakaṃ mṛtakam vā bhaveya rājabhayaṃ vā corabhayam vā ḍhossabhayam vā vātaputrabhayam vā viheṭhanā(7b4)bhiprāyā nimantrayeṃsu // tena gacchiyāṇa tahiṃ gṛhaṃ pṛcchitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:671: koci ima(ṃ)hi evannāmako upāsako dānapatī vā vāṇijakā (J.30) vā ti kim vā etat ti vaktavyaṃ bhikṣusaṃgho tena bhaktena nimantrito yadi tāva āhaṃsu nāsti koci imaṃhi evaṃnāmako kiḥsa upāsako /
T07abhisdhu:672: kasya bhaktaṃ kathaṃ bhaktaṃ ti jānitavyaṃ /

T07abhisdhu:677: atha dāni te jalpanti bhante eva(ta)ṃ sidhyati /

T07abhisdhu:693: atha khalu hastena pratyavekṣiyāṇa ānantariyāṇāṃ āsanāni varjayantehi /
T07abhisdhu:699: bhante oheyyaglānakānāṃ paṭipāṭikāyo piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhnatheti vaktavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:702: bhagavatā ca anekaparyāyeṇa glāṇo parindito kiṃ ambhehi śakyam vihārako śūnyako kartun ti
T07abhisdhu:703: atha dāni grīṣmo vā varṣārātro vā kālo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:705: oheyyaglānakānāṃ paṭipāṭikāye piṇḍapāto [gṛhnitavyo] na kṣamati la(8a2)bdhālabdhaṃ hantahantāye bhuñjiya labdho piṇḍo dvāraṃ paśyiya utthiya gantuṃ /
T07abhisdhu:706: atha khalu yadi tāva saṃghasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati dvitīyasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati
T07abhisdhu:708: tena odanasaṃpattī vā āgametavyaṃ vyañjanasampattī vā āgamaṃtena bhuñjitavyaṃ /

T07abhisdhu:713: tato yadi tāva jātakaṃ bhavati nāyaṃ dakṣiṇā ādiśitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:716: saptarātraṃ śunakhā śṛgā(lā) ce(ca) naṃ laṃghayantaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:717: kāko ca se akṣimalaṃ harantaṃ ti nāyaṃ evaṃ dakṣiṇā ādiśitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:720: buddhaṃ vipaśyiñ ca śikhiñ ca viśvabhuva /
T07abhisdhu:721: krakucchando ca kanakamuniñ ca kāśyapaṃ mahāmuniṃ śākyamuniṃ ca gotamaṃ //
T07abhisdhu:722: etehi buddhehi maharddhikehi ye devatā santi abhiprasannāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:723: (I.p.63) tā naṃ rakṣantu (tā ca naṃ pālayantu)
T07abhisdhu:726: ato śreyataro bhavaṃtu kumāro kulavarddhano (J.33) evaṃ dakṣiṇā ādiśitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:727: tathā yeva dakṣiṇāyo vistareṇa karttavyāyo yathā (8a5) saṃghasthavirasya bhaktāgre evaṃ sarvvehi bhaktāgre pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:732: śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā /
T07abhisdhu:733: te dāni āyuṣmanto nandanopanandanā ṣaḍvarggikāś ca upasaṃpādenti /
T07abhisdhu:750: kathaṃ saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇe pratipadyitavyaṃ // (8a7) etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu bhagavān āha /
T07abhisdhu:754: bhagavān āha // evaṃ nāma yūyaṃ upasaṃpādetha /
T07abhisdhu:755: upasaṃpādiya na ovadatha na anuśāsayatha nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:756: tad evaṃ sarvvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pratyārocayati /
T07abhisdhu:760: evaṃ (8b1) dāṇi yūyaṃ upasaṃpādiya naivovadatha nānuśāsatha tena hi evaṃ upādhyāyena śrā(sār)ddhavihāresmiṃ
T07abhisdhu:765: upasaṃpādetukenaiva ubhayato vinayo grāhayitavyo ubhayato vinayaṃ na pārayati ekato vinayo (I.p.64) grāhayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:767: pañcasūtrāṇi vista(8b2)reṇa grāhayitavyo pañcasūtrāṇi na pārayati catvāri dhā(vā) trīṇi duve ekaṃ sūtraṃ vistareṇa grāhayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:768: ekaṃ sūtraṃ na pāreti triṃśato pi grāhayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:769: śiṣṭakaṃ abhīkṣṇa(śruti)kāyo gāthāyo ca triṃśato pi na pāreti dve aniyatāṃ grāhayitavyo
T07abhisdhu:770: śiṣṭakaṃ abhīkṣṇaśrutikāyo gāthāyo ca dve aniyatā na pārenti /
T07abhisdhu:771: antamasato catvāri pārājikāṃ grāhayitavyo śiṣṭakaṃ abhīkṣṇaṃśrutikāyo gā(8b3)thāyo ca śekhayitavyo
T07abhisdhu:772: anuśāsayitavyo kālyaṃ madhyantikaṃ sāyaṃ sāyaṃ abhidharmmeṇa vā abhivinayena vā abhidharmmo nāma navavidho sūtrānto sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyādbhutādharmmā abhivinayo nāma prātimokṣo saṃkṣiptavistaraprabhedena /
T07abhisdhu:780: so eva tasya ovādo evaṃ svādhyāyati /
T07abhisdhu:800: vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni bhikṣū upasaṃpādenti /
T07abhisdhu:814: te(8b7)na hi evaṃ sārddhevihāriṇā upādhyāye pratipadyitavyaṃ // kin ti dāni evaṃ sārddhevihāriṇā
T07abhisdhu:817: utthaṃtena upādhyāyasya (I.p.65) vihārasya dvāraṃ ākoṭayitavyaṃ yaṃ kālaṃ abhyanujñā dinnā bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:818: tato dvāraṃ sukhākaṃ apaduriyāṇa tato prathamaṃ dakṣiṇo pādo praveśitavyo paścā vāmo praveśaya vanditvā sukhaśayitaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:836: atha khalu nātyāsanne (J.37) nātidūre tena dāni gocarāto nirggatasya upādhyāyasya
T07abhisdhu:838: ātmano skandhe dapi(yi)ya śīrṣaṃ onāmiya purato gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:839: vihāraṃ āgacchiyāṇa pīṭhikā prajñapayitavyā grāmapraveśanikāni cīvarāṇi ekānte sthapetavyāni
T07abhisdhu:848: nānānāvarṇṇitaṃ bhavati pṛcchitavyo suvihita kuto idaṃ labdhaṃ asukāto veśikakulāto vaḍaṃ vidhavāye sthūlakumārīye paṇḍakasya asukāye bhikṣuṇīye uśśakiyapariśaṅkiyāṇi kulāni vyapadiśati vāretavyo vaktavyo mā tahiṃ gaccha /
T07abhisdhu:852: vaktavyaṃ kārehi dhūmaṃ mā ca puno āmiṣacakṣu deśesi hastān nirmmādiya (I.p.66) hastanirmmādanaṃ dātavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:853: piṇḍapāto ukkaḍhitavyo piṇḍapāta upanāmayitavyo bhuñjantasya pānīyaṃ cāritavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:854: vījanavāto dātavyo bhaktavisarggo va(ka)rttavyo bhuktāviśya pātraṃ apakarṣitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:859: vihārako siñcitavyo sanmārjitavyo kālena kālaṃ gomayakārṣī dātavyā /
T07abhisdhu:865: divāvihāraṃ gacchantasya pīṭhikā nayitavyā niṣīdanaṃ nayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:868: atha dāni divāvihāraṃ gantukāmo bhavati āpṛcchiā(ya) gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:869: yadi dāni tahiṃ kenaci saha svādhyāyatukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:874: yadi so bhavati śaithaliko vā bāhuliko vā /
T07abhisdhu:883: āgatasya samānasya hastanirmādanaṃ dātavyaṃ puṣpāṇi dātavyāni cetipa(ya)ṃ ca(va)ndantasya pṛṣṭhato nugantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:897: uddiśitvā vā paripṛcchitvā vā yadi vihāro prāpuṇati /
T07abhisdhu:900: atha dāni dvitīyena saha prāpuṇati vihāraṃ upādhyāyena jānitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:901: yadi so bhavati śaithiliko (9b3) vā bāhuliko vā a(ā)vaḍḍhako vā (a)śikṣākāmo
T07abhisdhu:905: bhadrako guṇavān śikṣākāmo vaktavyo gṛhna yāvan na utthāpīyati sā eva me āpṛcchanikā atha dāni utthāpīyati pa(ya)ttikāṃ
T07abhisdhu:907: yadi dāni tahiṃ kenacit saha svādhyāyatukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:916: śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni āyuṣmanto nand(an)opanandano
T07abhisdhu:917: ṣaḍvarggikā ca niśrayaṃ dapi(yi)ya naiva antevāsi ovadanti /
T07abhisdhu:919: te dāni indragavā viya (9b5) varddhanti śivacchagalā viya
T07abhisdhu:930: kathaṃ saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇe pratipadyitavyaṃ // (9b6) etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:932: nand(an)opanandanāṃ ṣaḍvarggikānāṃ ca te dāni śabdāpitā /
T07abhisdhu:934: satyaṃ bhikṣavo nand(an)opanandanā ṣaḍvarggikāś ca evan nāma yūyaṃ niśrayaṃ detha niśrayaṃ dadiyāṇa antevāsikāṃ na
T07abhisdhu:935: ovadatha nānuśāsatha tad eva sarvvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pratyārocayati /
T07abhisdhu:938: evaṃ ca yūyaṃ niśrayaṃ dadiyaṃ antevāsikāṃ naiva ovadatha nānuśāsatha /
T07abhisdhu:939: tena hi evaṃ ācāryeṇa antevāsikasmiṃ pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:940: kin ti dāni ācāryeṇa antevāsikasmiṃ pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:941: ācāryeṇa tāva niśrayaṃ dentena antevāsi ubhayato vinayaṃ grāhayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:944: ekato vinayaṃ (I.p.68) na pāre(10a1)ti pañcasūtrāṇi vistareṇa grāhayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:945: pañcasūtrāṇi na pāreti catvāri trīṇi dve ekaṃ sūtraṃ vistareṇa grāhayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:947: dvānavatīto grāhayitavyo dvānavatīto na śaknoti triṃśatito grāhayitavyo śiṣṭakaṃ abhīkṣṇaśrutikāyo gāthāyo ca triṃśatito na pāreti dve aniyatāṃ grāhayitavyo śiṣṭakaṃ abhīkṣṇaśrutikāye gāthāyo ca /
T07abhisdhu:949: anta(10a2)masato catvāri pārājikāṃ grāhayitavyo śiṣṭakaṃ abhīkṣṇaśrutikāye gāthāyo va(ca) śekhayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:953: eṣo ācāryo niśrayaṃ dadiya antevāsi naiva ovadati /
T07abhisdhu:960: śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni bhikṣū niśrayan deṃti te antevāsikā ācārikasya niśrayaṃ gṛhniya naiva allīyanti /
T07abhisdhu:961: na pratyallīyanti te dāni bhikṣū odhyāyanti /
T07abhisdhu:963: imeṣāṃ muktikā yā (10a4) dāni asmākaṃ (naiva) allīyanti na pratyalīyanti /
T07abhisdhu:970: tena hi evaṃ antevāsinā ācārye pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:971: antevāsinā tāva kalpa(ya)to yeva utthatta(nta)kena evaṃ ācāryasya vihārasya
T07abhisdhu:974: dvāraṃ sukhākaṃ apaduriyāṇaṃ prathamaṃ dakṣiṇo pādo praveśayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:975: paścād vāmaṃ pādaṃ praveśayāṇa ācāryasya sukharātri
T07abhisdhu:989: vistareṇa yathā śra(sār)ddhevihārisya yāva dīpaṃ ādīpiya
T07abhisdhu:1006: śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā pañcārthavaśāṃ saṃpaśyamānās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:1010: katamāṃ pañca kaccim me śrāvakāḥ na karmmārāmā na karmmaratāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:1016: glānakānāñ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ anukampārthaṃ ye te (10b3) śrāddhāḥ kulaputrāḥ (tathāgatam evoddiśya)
T07abhisdhu:1018: te ca tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā atīva udārāṇi prītiprāmodyāni pratilabhiṣyanti /
T07abhisdhu:1020: saṃpaśyamānās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ paṃcāhikāṃ vihāracārikām anucaṃkramanti
T07abhisdhu:1022: adrākṣīd bhagavāṃ pañcāhikāṃ vihāracārikām anucaṃkramanto anuvi(10b4)caranto śayyāsanaṃ ujjhitaprakīrṇṇaṃ utpādakaṃ (J.45) u(du)tthitakaṃ vātātapena vināśiyantaṃ varṣeṇa ovarṣiyantaṃ prāṇakehi khajjantaṃ pakṣihi ohayiyantaṃ
T07abhisdhu:1024: ātape dinnaṃ bhagavāṃ jānanto yyeva bhikṣūṃ pṛcchati kasyemaṃ bhikṣavo śayyāsanaṃ ujjhitaprakīrṇṇaṃ peyālaṃ // yāva omayilamayilaṃ pāṭitavipāṭitaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:1028: evaṃ ca yūyaṃ apratyāstaraṇakā śayyāsanaṃ paribhuṃjatha /
T07abhisdhu:1033: na dāni kṣamati sāṃghikaṃ śayyāsanaṃ adhyupekṣituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:1034: utpādakam vā u(du)tthitakam vā prāṇakehi vā khajjantaṃ varṣeṇa (vā) ovarṣaparyantam vātātapena vā vināśiyantaṃ pakṣīhi thā(vā) oh(ay)iyantaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:1035: atha khalu yadi tā(10b6)va ujjhitaprakīrṇṇaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:1046: oddirṇṇako praluggako acaukṣo vā apratisaṃskṛto vā // atha khalu yadi
T07abhisdhu:1054: varṣāya ovṛṣṭo bhavati vikha(cikkha)llikā opūre(ta)vyā vaṃghorikā dātavyā gomayaśāṭo dātavyo na dāni kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:1057: apratyāstaraṇaṃ vā tṛṇaṃ vā tṛṇaṃ vā antarākṛtvā leṅkaṭakaṃ vā atha khalu pra(11a1)tyāstaraṇaṃ karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:1059: paṭikām vā loḍḍhakam vā pratyāstaraṇaṃ karttuṃ /
T07abhisdhu:1060: atha khalu dviguṇitā nāma karttavyā viśiṣṭā mañcāto vā yadi tāva kambalasya bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:1062: atha dāni karpāsasya bhavati dvipuṭā vā tripuṭā vā karttavyo samantena sūtreṇa śiviyāṇaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:1063: tato madhyeṇa dīrghasūtrāṇi dātavyāni tato na kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:1064: śayyāsanaṃ omayilomayilaṃ vā pāṭitavipāṭitam vā adhyu(11a2)pekṣituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:1068: na kṣamati sāṃghikena śayyāsanena prāvṛtena bhaktāgre vā tarpaṇāgre vā sāmāyikam vā upaviśituṃ
T07abhisdhu:1069: na kṣamati śayyāsanaṃ sāṃghikaṃ prāvariyaṃ dīrghaca(ṃ)kramaṃ
T07abhisdhu:1070: caṃkramituṃ // atha dāni bhikṣuḥ śirāviddhako vā bhavati virecanapītako vā glānako vā bhavati vastrapuggalikaṃ antarīkaraṇaṃ dadi(11a3)ya
T07abhisdhu:1073: nāpi kṣamati sāṃghikaṃ śayyāsanaṃ paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:1076: atha dāni sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ mahantaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:1077: uparito bhuṃjitavyaṃ (I.p.72) yathā nāśaṃ na gacche /
T07abhisdhu:1078: atha dāni hemantakālo bhavati sāṃghikaṃ śayyāsanaṃ prāvariya śayati /
T07abhisdhu:1085: bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni bhikṣū upagacchanikā(yāṃ) kāle vihāran na pratisaṃskarenti /
T07abhisdhu:1091: kacci me śrāvakāḥ na karmmārāmāḥ na karmmaratāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:1094: na bhāṣyaratāḥ na bhāṣyārāmatānuyogam anuyuktā viharanti /
T07abhisdhu:1095: na nidrārāmāḥ na nidrāratāḥ na nidrārāmatānuyogam anuyuktā viharanti /
T07abhisdhu:1096: glānakā(11a6)nāñ ca bhikṣūṇām anukampārthaṃ ye ca te śrāddhāḥ kulaputrāḥ tathāgatam evoddiśya āgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:1097: te ca tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā atiri(tī)vodārāṇi prītiprāmodyāni pratilabhiṣyanti /
T07abhisdhu:1098: imāṃ pañca arthavaśāṃ saṃpaśyamānās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ pañcāhikāṃ vihāracārikāṃ anucaṃkramanti /
T07abhisdhu:1100: (J.48) adrākṣīd bhagavāṃ pañcāhikāṃ vihāracārikāṃ anucaṃkramanto anuvi(11a7)caranto vihārakān
T07abhisdhu:1104: khajjantāṃ varye(ṣe)ṇa ovaryi(ṣi)yantāṃ kākaśakuntehi ohayiyantāṃ bhagavān jānanto pṛcchati
T07abhisdhu:1105: kasyeme bhikṣavo vihārakā odriṇṇakā paluggakā acaukṣā apratisaṃskṛtā śayyāsa(11b1)naṃ ujjhitaprakīrṇṇaṃ omayilomayilaṃ pāṭitavipāṭitaṃ mañcā pīṭhā (I.p.73) ondri(ddri)ṇṇakā
T07abhisdhu:1106: paluggakāṃ u(du)tthitakāṃ vātātapena opūriyantāṃ prāṇakehi khajjantāṃ varṣeṇa ovarṣiyantāṃ kākaśakuntehi ohayiyantāṃ bhikṣū āhaṃsu // imaṃ bhagavan saṃghasya ye dharmmā(varṣā)ṃ upagacchiṣyanti te pratisaṃskariṣyanti /
T07abhisdhu:1108: tena hi evaṃ varṣopanāyike śayyāsane pratipadyitavyaṃ /

T07abhisdhu:1143: pañcehi aṅgehi samanvāgato bhikṣuḥ śayyāsanaprajñāpaka saṃmutīye saṃmanyitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:1145: yo na cchandāye na do(11b5)ṣāye na mohāye na bhayāye prajñaptaṃ ca jānāti /

T07abhisdhu:1151: dvārakoṣṭhako varccakuṭī udupāno jantāko caṃkramā vṛkṣamūlā vihārakā (I.p.74) grāhayitavyā
T07abhisdhu:1153: pīṭhakā vā ettakaṃ āstaraṇaṃ ettakaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ tato likhitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:1157: trayodaśīyaṃ vā cāturddaśīyaṃ vā tena śayyāsanoddeśo karttavyo /
T07abhisdhu:1160: cāturddaśīyam vā pāñcadaśīyam vā śayyāsano(11b7)ddeśo karttavyo /
T07abhisdhu:1163: āyuṣman amuke vihārake ettakā mañcā ettakā pīṭhāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:1164: ettakaṃ āstaraṇaṃ ettakaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ katamo tava vihārako rucyati /
T07abhisdhu:1165: yo saṃghasthavirasya vihārako rucyati so dātavyo /
T07abhisdhu:1173: vṛddhāntato prabhṛti yāva avarya(ṣa)kaparyantaṃ na kṣamati /

T07abhisdhu:1187: dviṇṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ (vā) janānāṃ eko vihārako uddiśitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:1188: atha dāni evaṃ pi stokā bhavanti /

T07abhisdhu:1197: atha dāni evaṃ pi stokaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:1201: atha dāni evaṃ pi alpāvakāśo bhavati /

T07abhisdhu:1291: udakabhramāḥ pranāḍikābhramā vā kālena kālaṃ śodhitavyāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:1293: mañcā vā pīṭhā vā anyāyataḥ karttavyaṃ /

T07abhisdhu:1299: atha dāni usvedako bhavati śuddhena gomayena mardditavyaṃ /

T07abhisdhu:1307: ku(13a1)ṣṭhena bhurjena vā saktuhi vā evaṃ varṣopagatakehi (J.56)

T07abhisdhu:2071: niravaśeṣaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādatha tena hi śeṣāś catvāri aṅgulāni dantakāṣṭhasya varjyaṃ karttavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2072: atha dāni bhikṣū āraṇyake śeyyāsane prativasanti /
T07abhisdhu:2079: (19b7) divasaṃ evam eva khādiya evaṃ tāva khādayitavyaṃ yāva dantakāṣṭhasya catvāri aṅgulāni avaśiṣṭāni tato cchoritavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2080: so eṣo bhikṣuḥ niravaśeṣaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādati vinayātikrama(ṃ) āsādayati /
T07abhisdhu:2081: dantakāṣṭhaṃ pi nāma khādantena na kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2082: stūpavigrahe vā saṃghavigrahe vā dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādinta(tu)ṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2083: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ glāno bhavati śirāviddhako vā virecanapītako vā ghṛta(20a1)pītako vā kiñcāpi saṃghavigrahe dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādati /
T07abhisdhu:2089: atha khalu kaṭa(ṭā)hake vā mallake vā koṭiyāṃ vā āviddhapuṭikāyām vā kheṭaṃ cchorayitavyo
T07abhisdhu:2092: dantakāṣṭhaṃ pi dāni khādantena nāpi kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2093: upasthānaśā(20a2)lāyām vā agniśālāyām vā bhaktaśālāyām vā kalpiyaśālāyām vā kalpikakuṭikāyām vā saṃghamadhye (vā)
T07abhisdhu:2094: upādhyāyācāryāṇām vā agrato vṛddhatarakānām vā bhikṣūṇāṃ agrato dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2095: nāpi kṣamati mātṛgrāmasya agrato dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:2097: cetiyaṃ vandantena oguṇṭhitaśīrṣeṇa vā ohitahastena vā tha(ce)tiyāti(bhi)gṛhe vā prāsāde vā
T07abhisdhu:2100: dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādiya madhyena pāṭiyāna jihvāṃ nilehituṃ kāmabhoginā yathā /
T07abhisdhu:2101: atha dāni bhikṣu jihvāṃ nilehitukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2103: nāpi kṣamati vibhūṣaṇābhiprāyeṇa dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādituṃ // atha khalu durggandhaprahāṇārthaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ khāditavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2108: sa eṣo bhikṣuḥ sarvveṇa sarvvaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ na khādati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
T07abhisdhu:2114: atha dāni navako śaithiliko bāhuliko bhavati vṛddhatareṇa uddhṛtavyo /
T07abhisdhu:2139: na karmmārāmatānuyogam anuyuktā viharanti vistareṇa yāvad adrākṣīd bhagavāṃ pañcāhikāṃ vihāracārikām anucaṃkramanto anuvicaranto anyataraṃ bhikṣu bhūmau astariya cīvaraṃ (20b1) sīvantaṃ bhagavāṃ jānanto pṛcchanti kim idaṃ bhikṣuḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2143: evan taṃ tvaṃ bhūmīya astarīya cīvaraṃ sivayasi /
T07abhisdhu:2145: kaṭhinaṃ tāva bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena dvādaśahastāṃ āyāmato karttavyo /
T07abhisdhu:2146: aṣṭahastāṃ vistāreṇa vaṃśānāṃ vā nalānām vā na(ṃ)galānāṃ vā kāṇḍānām vā carukānām vā rohiṣāṇām
T07abhisdhu:2147: vā sūtrikāya vā rejjukāya vā (20b2) ghaṇa buṇitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2148: yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣuḥ cīvaraṃ sīvitukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2149: upasthānaśālāyāṃ vā agniśālāyāṃ vā prāsāde vā prahāṇake kaṭhinaṃ prajñāpayitvā cīvaraṃ sīvitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2150: kaṭhinaṃ astariyāṇaṃ pādāṃ (J.92) dhoviyāṇaṃ kaṭhinasmiṃ pallaṃkenopaviśiyāṇaṃ taṃ cīvaraṃ sīvitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2151: atha dāni aparo pi koci sīvayi(tu)kāmo bhavati tenāpi pādāṃ dhovayitvā kaṭhinasmiṃ pallaṃkenopaviśiya cīvaraṃ, (20b3) sīvayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2152: atha dāni niṣaṇṇo bāhirakāṃ pādāṃ kṛtvā mū(sū)traṃ valento āsati anāpattiḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2153: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ pādānaṃ(ni) dhovayitukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2156: atha khalu bāhyena kaṭhinasmi pādāni thapi/yāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ sīvayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2158: kaṭhinaṃ savva(nva)ṭiyāṇaṃ bhittīye dve kīlakāni khaniya rajjue (20b4)
T07abhisdhu:2160: yadi aparo pi koci sīvayitukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2161: tenāpi kaṭhinaṃ astarīya cīvarakaṃ yeca(va) tathā sīvayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2162: nāpi kṣamati kaṭhinasya raṅge vā śodhayituṃ gomayaṃ vā cīvarakāni vā śodhayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2166: ullaggakaṃ vā paluggakaṃ vātātapena vināsiyantaṃ varṣeṇa vā ova(20b5)rṣayantaṃ pakṣīhi vā ohayi(pi)yantāṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2167: (J.93) atha khalu kālena kālaṃ bandhitavyaṃ kālena kālaṃ pratisaṃskarttavyo /
T07abhisdhu:2169: mañcasya vā upari cīvaraṃ pīṭhasya vā upari cīvarakaṃ kariyāṇaṃ sīvitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2172: upasthānaśālāyām vā maṇḍalamāḍe vā pradeśakaṃ gomayena upalimpiya cīvarakaṃ sīvitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2173: antamasa(20b6)to jānukānāṃ pi upari cīvarakaṃ thaviya sīvayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2179: so dāni yathāsukhaṃ kṛte vihārakaṃ apaduriya praviśati śītalakaṃ ca tena ākrāntaṃ tasya bhavati dīrghako mayā ākrānto tasya dāni tena nivare(ra)ṇena sarvva(20b7)rātriṃ cittaṃ na samādhānaṃ gacchati
T07abhisdhu:2184: vaṃśānām vā naḍānām vā naṅgalānām vā kaṇḍānām vā rejjukāye vā mū(sū)trakāye vā ghaṇā buṇitavyā tathā karttavyā /
T07abhisdhu:2186: vihārasya dvārasmiṃ upari trayo kīlakāni āṭapitavyā (21a1) tahiṃ cakkalī bandhitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:2187: osāriyāṇaṃ heṣṭhe dve kīlakānāṃ pīḍiyāṇa tahiṃ (J.94)
T07abhisdhu:2189: yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣuḥ prahāṇaṃ otaranti tato dvāraṃ muñcitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2190: nivāpiyāṇa cakkalī osāriyāṇaṃ kīlakehi bandhiyāṇa tato osāritavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2191: yaṃ kālaṃ prahāṇasya yathāsukhaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2192: tato vihāraṃ gacchiyāṇaṃ cakkalī utkṣipitavyā // nāpi dāni sahasā anekāyo mā tarhi dīrghako praviṣṭo bhavepa(21a2)ya nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:2193: atha khalu khaṭakhaṭāpayitavyo kāṣṭhena vā kaṭhallena vā tato paścāc cakkalī utkṣipitavyā
T07abhisdhu:2198: apaduccaritavyaṃ cakkalī utkṣipiyāṇaṃ dvāraṃ pivi(dhi)yāṇaṃ cakkalī osāriyāṇaṃ prahāṇaṃ otaritavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2201: cakkalī utkṣipiyāṇaṃ upari bandhitavyā // dvāraṃ apaduriya tato praviśitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2202: evaṃ devasikaṃ na dāni kṣamati divasata osarayitvā thapayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2211: bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā pañcārthavasāṃ saṃpaśyamānā yāva vistareṇa kṛtvā yāvad adrākṣīd bhagavān pañcāhikāṃ vihāracārikām anucaṃkramanto vihārāṃ oddriṇṇakāṃ palluggakāṃ ullāpe(ye) gṛhītakāṃ acaukṣāṃ apratisaṃskṛtāṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2213: kiṃ ke(i)me bhikṣu vihārakā oddriṇṇakā paluggakā ollāye gṛhītakā acaukṣā apratisaṃskṛtā tena hi evaṃ vihāre pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2214: vihārā nāma trīṇi jyeṣṭhako madhyamako kanīyasako jyeṣṭhako nāma vihārako bhūmi bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2217: kṛtakarmmā evaṃ jye(21a6)ṣṭhako kin ti madhyamako kin ti dāni
T07abhisdhu:2222: kin ti dāni kanīyasako bhūmi bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2224: ullāpo prapāṇḍaro nāhaiva bhitti kṛtaparikarmmā evaṃ kanīyasako /
T07abhisdhu:2225: yo dāni jyeṣṭhako bhavati vihāro nāyaṃ kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2226: tahiṃ maṃcā (21a7) vā pīṭhā vā praviśituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2228: mā bhūmī khanīyaṃ ti praveśiyāṇaṃ tato tahiṃ pratipādakānāṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2233: pīṭhasyāpi evaṃ yyeva āsandakaṃ tṛpādakaṃ vā praveśeti /
T07abhisdhu:2238: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ śeyyāṃ prajñapayitukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2241: śeyyāṃ prajñapayantenaiva cchi(ccha)tti nikkālayitavyā nāpi kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2242: tahiṃ pādāṃ dhovituṃ hastāṃ dhovituṃ mukhaṃ dhovituṃ nāpi kṣamati tahiṃ caṃkrama caṃkramituṃ // pattholiṃ dhunantena /
T07abhisdhu:2243: atha dāni bhikṣu glāno bhavati kiñ cāpi ṣaṭapañca gatāṃgatāṃ deti anāpa(21b2)ttiḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2249: na kṣamati tahiṃ bhaktakṛtyaṃ pure(J.97)bhaktikaṃ vā karttuṃ pātraṃ vā nirmmādayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2251: madhyamake pi eṣo eva paryāyo ananyo adhikṛto /
T07abhisdhu:2253: kiñ cāpi bhikṣuḥ vinā pratipādakehi mañcakaṃ thapeti /
T07abhisdhu:2255: (21b3) pīṭhakam vā pīṭhikām vā tṛpādakam vā vinā pratipādakehi thapetti anāpattiḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2264: yadi tāva upeḍanako so vihārako bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2268: kiñ cāpi bhikṣuḥ pādām vā dhovati mukham vā dhovati /
T07abhisdhu:2275: oddriṇṇako vā paluggako vā ollāye gṛhītako vā acokṣo vā (21b5) adhyupekṣituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2313: pañcārthavaṃśā(śāṃ) vistareṇa kṛtvā yāva adrākṣīd bhagavān pañcāhikāṃ vihāracārikām anucaṃkramanto
T07abhisdhu:2317: kiṃ imāyo bhikṣave vihārakānāṃ bhittiyo pakka-kheṭena pakkasiṃghāṇakena varttīhi lamba(J.99)ntīhi
T07abhisdhu:2319: kin ti dāni evaṃ kheṭe pratipadyitavyaṃ nāyaṃ kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2320: bhikṣuṇā kṛtakarmmāyāṃ vā akṛ(22a2)takarmmāyāṃ vā bhittīyaṃ kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā cchorayituṃ // atha khalu kheṭakaṭāhaṃ karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2321: kapālaṃ vā mallam vā kuṇḍikam vā dakānakam vā liptopaliptaṃ kariya vālikāye vā pāṣāṇasya vā patthaliddrakānāṃ vā pūrayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2325: atha khalu kālena kālaṃ ccho(22a3)riya anyasya pūrayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2328: atha dāni (I.p.104) kheṭakaṭāhakaṃ bhavati mallakaṃ vā koṭikam vā āviddhapuṭikā vā thapetavyā tahiṃ kheṭo
T07abhisdhu:2330: kālena kālaṃ visarjayitavyo // atha dāni evaṃ pi na bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2333: atha khalu ekasya upānahāye (22a4) tale cchorayitavyaṃ dvitīyena marddayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2338: ito ca cchoriyanto caṃkramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
T07abhisdhu:2340: caṃkramaśīrṣe vā āviddhapuṭikā vā (J.100) vālikā(22a5)ye vā kūṭimallakaṃ vā thapetavyaṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:2346: atha dāni bhūmyastāro bhavati bhājane karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2347: kuntake vā alābuke vā vaṃśattholikāyāṃ vā /
T07abhisdhu:2349: kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakaṃ, (22a6) vā utthitvā ekānte kṛtvā punaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2353: eṣo dāni bhikṣusya gocaraṃ praviśantasya athā(dhvā)namārggagatasya vā kheṭe āgacchati cchoriya pādena marditavyo /
T07abhisdhu:2355: atha dāni kṣudro kheṭe upāṃsulo ca bhūmī bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2359: eṣo bhikṣuḥ stūpaṃ vandati stūpābhigṛhe vā kheṭaṃ cchoritakaṃ kena ci aprakṛtijño na pādena marditavyo /
T07abhisdhu:2363: atha dāni navakataro śaithiliko bāhuliko vā bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2368: (J.101) bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā apareṇa dāni bhikṣuṇā muṇḍe vātapāṇe pātraṃ sthavitaṃ tan dāni
T07abhisdhu:2369: vātamaṇḍalikāye (I.p.105) āgacchiyāṇaṃ bhūmīyaṃ pātito bhinno kapālānāṃ rāśiṃ kṛtvā yavāgūye gaṇḍī ākoṭitā so dāni hastāṃ nirmmādiya vihārakaṃ praviṣṭo paśyati /
T07abhisdhu:2370: kapālikānāṃ rāśiṃ etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ yo(so) bhikṣuḥ bhagavato āroca(22b2)ye /
T07abhisdhu:2372: evaṃ ca tvaṃ muṇḍavātapāne pātraṃ thapesi tena hi evaṃ pātre pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2373: kin ti dāni evaṃ pātre pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2374: bhikṣuṇā tāva kalyato yeca(va) nivāsiya prāvariya pātracīvaram ādāya gocaraṃ praviśitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2375: gocarāto nirddhāviya āhāraṃ karīya pātraṃ nirmmādayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2377: karkaśena vā cūrṇṇena karkaśena vā gomayena nirmmādayituṃ // atha (22b3) khalu mūlarasena vā patrarasena vā puṣparasena vā nirvvālikena vā gomayena nirmmādayitavyaṃ nāpi
T07abhisdhu:2378: kṣamati vilvasya vā pakvasya kapitthasya pakvasya nālikerasya heṣṭhe nirmmādayituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:2379: mā pakvena vā vilvena pakvena vā kapitthena pakvena vā nālikereṇa bhaṃjeya nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:2380: nāpi kṣamati dariniśritena vā pātraṃ nirmmādayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2381: mā patitaṃ bhañjaya nti(tti) (22b4) atha khalu karṣadhāne
T07abhisdhu:2382: vā vālikādhāne vā dūrvvāsādvale vā nirmmādayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2383: nāpi kṣamati sthitakena pātraṃ nirmmādayituṃ // nāpi kṣamati (J.102) bhūmīye ghasantena // atha khalu upaviṣṭe(ṣṭa)kena nirmmādayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2386: sthitakena adhvāpayituṃ // atha khalu upaviṣṭena adhvāpayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2390: atha khalu pātra praveśikāyāṃ prakṣipiya sthapetavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2391: nāpi kṣamati sthitakena prakṣipituṃ // atha khalu upaviṣṭakena prakṣipitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2392: pātraprasevikānāgadantake vā kīlake vā ukkaciya thapetavyā /
T07abhisdhu:2400: kāṣṭham vā iṣṭakam vā upalam vā nirāmiṣaṃ nirmmādiya tasya upari sthapetavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2401: atha dāni evaṃ pi na bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2405: ekahastena duve trayo vā pātrāṇi gṛhnituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:2406: a(22b7)tha khalu paramaṃ trayo pātrāṇi gṛhnitavyāni /
T07abhisdhu:2411: pātreṇa pātraṃ mārggituṃ // atha khalu hastena mārggitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2412: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ upādhyāyasya cā(vā)cāryasya vā pātram allīpayati nāpi kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2413: upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā pātraṃ vāmena (J.103) hastena
T07abhisdhu:2415: atha khalu (23a1) upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā dakṣiṇena hastena pātraṃ allīpayitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2420: nirmmādayantena prathamaṃ upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā pātraṃ nirmmādayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2421: paścād ātmano śoṣayantena prathamaṃ upādhyāyasya vā ācāryyasya vā śoṣayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2425: dupuṭā tṛpuṭā prasevikāyāṃ prakṣipiyantena kalāvīyaṃ dāḍīyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2426: aṃsibaddhakaṃ prakṣipitvā samavasthāya upaviṣṭakena utsaṅgasya upari prakṣipitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2427: mañcasya vā pīṭhasya vā upari prakṣipitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2428: ullayantena kīrṇṇa(la)kaṃ hastena pratyavekṣitvā mañcasya vā pīṭhasya vā upari jālavātāya(23a3)ne vā pātramelake vā yathā na ghaṭṭeṃsu nāpi kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2429: pātraṃ adhyupekṣituṃ phalakena vā khajjantaṃ khaṇḍaṃ vā cchidram vā /
T07abhisdhu:2435: uccāro vā prasrāvo vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃghāṇakaṃ vā vighaso vā saṃkāro vā anyam vā aprayattaṃ grahetuṃ,
T07abhisdhu:2437: pātre(23a4)ṇa keṣāṃ (J.104) otārayitum vā pādaṃ vā mukhaṃ vā
T07abhisdhu:2452: he he he nāyaṃ kiñca(ci)d yāgu gaṅgā ayaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2453: sarayū ajiravatī mahī mahāmahī tti nicuḍabuntikāye imaṃhi taṇḍulā mārggitavyā // atha dāni khakkhaṭa bhavati jalpati /
T07abhisdhu:2454: he he he nāyaṃ kiñci yavāgū lecchaṃ ayaṃ peyyā ayaṃ peyyā ayaṃ kaṭṭārikā cchejjā ayaṃ te dāni bhikṣū utkṣiptā bhavanti /
T07abhisdhu:2463: kin ti dāni evaṃ yavāgūye pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2464: eṣo dāni yavāgūye samayo ārocito bhavati /

T07abhisdhu:2474: khādayitavyā(vyaṃ /) mukhaṃ dhoviya hastāṃ nirmmādiya pātraṃ gṛhniya
T07abhisdhu:2476: nāpi kṣamati yavāgū upānahārūḍhena vā praticchituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2478: atha khalu upānahā nikhosiya ekāṃśakṛtena yavāgū praticchitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:2480: pā(r)ṣṇivabrā(ddhrā) omuñcitavyā dvitīyakālikasya lābhagrāhaṃ adhyeṣitvā gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2485: he he he gaṅgā āyaṃ sarvvaṃ yā(23b2)va mahī candrabhāgā ayaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2486: atha dāni atighanā bhavati na vaktavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2487: nāyaṃ yavāgū odano ayaṃ daṇḍāsani bhejjā ayaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2488: atha khalu yādṛśī dīyati tādṛśī praticchitā dāyakavaśo (J.106) na pratigrāhakavaśo // atha dāni bhikṣuḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2490: atiśītam vā ati-uṣṇam vā bhikṣu naiva dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādati /
T07abhisdhu:2494: vaktavyaṃ āyuṣman imaṃ mama yavāgūye pratyaṃśaṃ gṛhna /
T07abhisdhu:2497: ete vilambakā yavāgūḥ nindanti vā prasaṃsanti vā vinayātikramaṃ āsādayanti /
T07abhisdhu:2502: bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati vistareṇa nidā(23b4)naṃ kṛtvā aparo dāni
T07abhisdhu:2503: bhikṣuḥ yogācāro vaidehake parvvate niṣaṇṇo cittaṃ samādhayiṣyāmīti /
T07abhisdhu:2505: āgacchiya tasya purato sthito tasya dāni tena
T07abhisdhu:2506: nīva(ra)ṇena cittaṃ samādhānaṃ na gacchati etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ so
T07abhisdhu:2508: śabdāpayatha taṃ bhikṣuṃ so dāni śabdāpito /
T07abhisdhu:2510: satyaṃ bhikṣu (23b5) evaṃ nāma aparo yogācāro vaidehake parvvate niṣaṇṇo cittaṃ samādhayiṣyan ti /
T07abhisdhu:2511: tvaṃ dāni tasya purato āgacchiya sthito tasya dāni tena nīvaraṇena cittaṃ samādhānaṃ na gacchati
T07abhisdhu:2514: duṣkṛtaṃ te bhikṣu eva(ṃ) ca tvaṃ yogācārasya bhikṣusya purato tiṣṭhasi tena hi evaṃ sthātavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2516: nāyaṃ tāva kṣamati (J.107) bhi(23b6)kṣuṇā yogācārasya bhikṣusya purato
T07abhisdhu:2517: tiṣṭhituṃ nāpi kṣamati veśikā samantakena vā tiṣṭhituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2520: atigupte vā atiprākaṭe vā pradeśe tiṣṭhituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2522: na (I.p.109) kṣamati stūpaṃ vā pṛṣṭhato kṛtvā tiṣṭhituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:2523: saṃghaṃ vā upādhyāyācāryam vā vṛddhatarakaṃ vā pṛṣṭhato kṛtvā tiṣṭhituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2524: upānahārūḍhena (23b7) vā tiṣṭhantu khaṃbhakṛtena vā oguṇṭhitaśīrṣeṇa vā ovāhitahastena vā nāpi kṣamati saṃghamadhye mā
T07abhisdhu:2526: upādhyāyācāryehi vā uktena samānena mā tiṣṭheti tiṣṭhati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
T07abhisdhu:2528: kiñ cāpi opānahāruḍho oguṇṭhitaśīrṣo vā ohitahasto vā tiṣṭhati /
T07abhisdhu:2530: evaṃ sthātavyaṃ na tiṣṭhati // abhisamācārikān dharmmān atikrā(24a1)mati // * //
T07abhisdhu:2532: bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā aparo dāni bhikṣuḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2533: yogācāro vaidehake parvvate niṣaṇṇo cittaṃ samādhayiṣyāmīti /
T07abhisdhu:2535: āgatvā tasya purato tālapādukāhi ābaddhāhi dīrghacaṃkramaṃ caṃkramati /
T07abhisdhu:2536: ṭapya ṭaṭapya ṭapya ṭaṭapya nti(tti) tasya (J.108) dāni tena śabdena cittaṃ na samādhānaṃ gacchati /
T07abhisdhu:2540: satyaṃ bhikṣu evaṃ nāmā aparo yogācāro vaidehake parvvate niṣaṇṇo cittaṃ samādhayiṣyāmīti
T07abhisdhu:2541: tad evaṃ sarvvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pratyārocayati /
T07abhisdhu:2542: yāva tasya dāni tena śabdena cittaṃ na
T07abhisdhu:2547: evaṃ ca tvaṃ yogācārasya bhikṣusya purato caṃkramasi /
T07abhisdhu:2550: nāyan tāva kṣamati bhikṣuṇā yogācārasya bhikṣusya purato caṃkramituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2551: nāpi kṣamati stūpam vā pṛṣṭhato kṛtvā caṃkramituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2555: upādhyāyena vā ācāryeṇa vā sārddhaṃ caṃkramati /
T07abhisdhu:2556: upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya ati(24a4)rekaṃ caṃkramituṃ nāpi kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2558: atha khalu dve trayo vā padā (I.p.110) nihinakena caṃkramitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2561: atha dāni glāno ghṛtaṃ vā pītaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2562: virecanaṃ vā pītaṃ kiñ cāpi caṃkramati /
T07abhisdhu:2564: purato samaṃ vā gantuṃ ohayitvā gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2567: atha khalu abhidakṣiṇaṃ agrato karentena anuparivarttitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2572: (J.109) nāpi kṣamati atiprākaṭe vā pradeśe caṃkramituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2578: bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvarggikāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2585: satyaṃ bhikṣavo ṣaḍvarggikā evaṃ nāma yūyaṃ uṣṭraparyaṅkena prahāṇe niṣīdatha /
T07abhisdhu:2589: evaṃ ca yūyaṃ uṣṭraparyaṅkena prahāṇe niṣīdatha /
T07abhisdhu:2596: ekaṃ nāgaṃ dve nāgā anuparidhā(vā)rya niṣīdanti /
T07abhisdhu:2597: dve nāgā catvāri nāgā anuparivārya niṣīdanti catvāri aṣṭa aṣṭa ṣoḍaśa ṣoḍaśa (dvātriṃśad)
T07abhisdhu:2603: bhikṣu paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇo bhavati śrānto bha(24b2)vati /
T07abhisdhu:2607: atha khalu eko pādo sukhākaṃ prasārayitavyo taṃ amuhūrtte viśrāmiya sanmiñjiya dvitīyo pādo sukhākaṃ prasārayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:2611: atha dāni jarādurbbalo vā vyādhidurbbalo vā bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2616: atha dāni ekānte bhavati ucchedake vā vṛkṣamūlake vā vihāre vā pratisaṃlīnako kiñ cāpi oguṇṭhitaśīrṣo niṣīdati /
T07abhisdhu:2618: amūhūrttakaṃ viśramiya bhūyo svastikaparyaṅkena niṣīditavyaṃ // atha dāni bhikṣu na pāreti
T07abhisdhu:2621: atha dāni arddhaparyaṅkenāpi na pāreti niṣīdituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:2630: nāpi kṣamati saṃghamadhye mā niṣīda nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:2635: uktena niṣīdituṃ nāpi kṣamati vesikāsāmāntena dyutikaraśālāsāmantakena niṣīdituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2643: bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvarggikāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2654: evaṃ nāma yūyaṃ omuddhakāpi (I.p.112) śeyyāṃ kalpetha /
T07abhisdhu:2673: yathā siṃho mṛgarāja siṃho bhikṣavo mṛgarājā dakṣiṇena pārśvena śeyyāṃ kalpayati /
T07abhisdhu:2676: aṅgulaṃ anukāyaṃ āyacchihitvā dakṣiṇāṃ bāhaṃ śirasy upanidhāya vāmaṃ bāhām anukāyaṃ prasārayitvā so pi pratibodhanāṃ(nan)/tena purimaṃ kāyaṃ abhyunnāmeti /
T07abhisdhu:2681: gātrāṇām anyathātvaṃ tena bhavati citte ā[ttamano] a(25a3)bhiraddho bhikṣuṇāpi tāva śeyyāṃ prajñapeṃtena abhidakṣiṇāṃ prajñapayitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:2687: cīvaravaṃśasya heṣṭhato rātrīye purimaṃ yāmaṃ uddeśaprayuktena svādhyāyaprayuktena sthānena
T07abhisdhu:2690: pādena pādam ādhāya jihvāgraṃ tālukāgre pratiṣṭhāpayitvā dakṣiṇāṃ bāhāṃ śirasy upanidhāya vāmāṃ bāhāṃ anukāyaṃ prasāritvā utthānasaṃjñī manasikākārentena nāpi dāni parivarttakaṃ yāvat sūryodgamanāt tato śayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2694: duḥkhaśāyī bhavati pāraśyena pāraśyaṃ pallaṭṭanto (I.p.113) śayiti anāpattiḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2696: dakṣiṇe pārśve gaṇḍaṃ vā piṭakaṃ vā /
T07abhisdhu:2698: kiñ cāpi vāmena pārśvena śayati anāpattiḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2704: vṛddhatarakaṃ vā pādato kṛtvā upādhyāyācāryaṃ vā pādato kṛtvā śeyyāṃ kalpayituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:2718: bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvarggikāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2719: dvāraṃ bandhiyāṇaṃ vihārasya paścā vastuke kākavāhaṃ bhaṃjantaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2721: āgantukānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gaṇo āgato dvāraṃ yāvanti na labhanti te dāni okkhandiyāṇaṃ praviṣṭāḥ
T07abhisdhu:2728: āyuṣman evaṃ ca yūyaṃ okkhandiyāṇaṃ vihāraṃ praviśatha /
T07abhisdhu:2730: evaṃ ca yūyaṃ dvāraṃ bandhiyāṇaṃ vihārasya paścād vastukasya kākavāhaṃ bhañjantā āsatha te dāni vivaditāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2734: te(ne)vāsikehi vihārasya dvāraṃ bandhiyāṇaṃ vihārasya paścād vastukasya kākavāhaṃ bhaṃjamānehi āsituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2741: kin ti dāni evaṃ āgantukehi pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2757: hṛtaṃ me pātracīvaram iti gacchantasya karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2758: yadi dāni ośyā bhavati taruṇabhikṣūhi agrato gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2760: atha dāni vyāḍabhayaṃ vā corabhayaṃ vā bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2765: yadi dāni grāmasya nagarasya vā madhyena gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2772: taruṇā bhikṣu duve vā trayo vā praveśayitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:2773: agrato gacchatha saṃghasya phāsuvi[hāra]ṃ upa(25b6)dahatha pādatailena guḍapānīyena pratiśrayeṇa purebhaktikena tehi dāni prāvariya gaṇṭhipāsakaṃ obandhiya āmantriya praveṣṭavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2776: āvi(ci)kṣitavyaṃ labdho pratiśrayo tehi dāni yadi tahiṃ ogho vā (J.117) bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2777: nadī taḍāgaṃ vā puṣkiriṇī vā udupāno vā tahiṃ pādā(25b7)n prakṣāletvā prāvaretvā anyonyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2781: mā paśyeṃsu samāmapayi ime pravrajitā karonti /
T07abhisdhu:2782: atha dāni ubhaṃḍito bhavati saṃvibhajitvā praveṣṭavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2791: saṃghārāmaṃ praviśantehi puṣkiriṇīyaṃ vā taḍāge vā oghe vā pādāṃ dhovitvā praveṣṭavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2792: atha dāni ubbhaṃḍito saṃvibhajitvā praveṣṭavyaṃ cetiyāṇaṃ pradakṣiṇī karentehi upānahā omuñcitvā kāṣṭhakena gṛhnitvā praveṣṭavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2794: nāpi nevāsikāṃ ullaya(pa)nte(26a2)hi hū ha he adyāpi taṃ tad evettha vasatha ghuṇa
T07abhisdhu:2795: viddhātave nand(an)opanandanā yūyaṃ nāgarājāno ihaiva yūyaṃ jātā ihaiva mariṣyatha jātā te śṛgālā ye tumbhāṇaṃ māṃsāni khādiṣyanti /
T07abhisdhu:2797: hū ha he caṇḍamuktaṃ pañcavarṣikaṃ pravṛttaṃ yathāpāṭito nāpi dāni vaktavyaṃ ko itthaṃ kati varṣo utthiha nāpi dāni (J.118) vaktavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2798: ko bhaktakā nātithikā kasya śuve bhaktata(26a3)rpaṇaṃ purobhaktikaṃ vā (I.p.116) nāpi dāni
T07abhisdhu:2800: atha dāni paścād vastuke mṛttikākarmmaṃ karonti /
T07abhisdhu:2803: ārāmikā śrāmaṇero vā yasya oheyyako so vaktavyo dvāraṃ rakṣanto āsā(sa /) atha dāni apadurako vihāro bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2809: tahiṃ navakaṃ tasmiṃ cīvarabisiyan thaviyāṇaṃ kuṇḍikāṃ vā upānahau vā thaviyāṇa nevāsikā pṛcchitavyāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2810: āyuṣmaṃ pādadhovanikā kahiṃ kalpiyakarakī kahiṃ akalpi(ya)karakī kahi(ṃ) yadi tāva āvi(ci)kṣanti pādadhovanikāyāṃ pādāṃ (26a5) dhoviyāṇaṃ akalpiyakarakīto hastā nirmmādiyāṇa kalpiyakarakīto prakṣāliya tato cetiyaṃ vanditavyaṃ cetiyaṃ vandiyāṇaṃ yatra nevāsikā bhavanti tatra gantavyaṃ allīyāṇaṃ nāpi kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2813: āyuṣman vandiṣyan ti nevāsikehi varṣāgraṃ pṛcchitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2814: kati varṣo āyuṣmana yadi (J.119) tāva āgantuko vṛddhatarako bha(26a6)vati /
T07abhisdhu:2820: āyuṣman asti etāvati varṣasya vihārako prāpuṇati /
T07abhisdhu:2821: yadi tāva jalpati prāpuṇati tti vihārako gṛhnitavyo mañca pīṭhaṃ bisi caturasrako kuccaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2824: tri(te)hi āgantukehi nevāsikāṃ kutsiya haṃbhiya āyuṣmann adyāpi yūyaṃ iha vasatha he he śiṣṭā vaṣṭā yūyaṃ jānāte ye śṛgālā ye yuṣmākaṃ māṃsāni
T07abhisdhu:2826: atha khalu saṃpraharṣayitavyā vaktavyā āyuṣman śobhanaṃ kriyati saṃghārāmo kelāpīyati /
T07abhisdhu:2829: avikālako pādāṃ dhoviya mrakṣiya dīpaṃ ādīpi(26b1)ya śeyyāṃ prajñapiya pratikramitavyaṃ nāpi dāni kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:2831: āyuṣman kiṃ sidhyati kiṃ pacyati kiṃ bhaktakānāṃ sthitikā /
T07abhisdhu:2832: atha khalu kalyato yeva utthiya nivāsiya prāvariya hastān nirmmādiya pātraṃ gṛhniya praviśitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2833: atha dāni tahiṃ vihārake anugraho bhavati vihārakaṃ vā bhakta bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2840: atha dāni bhaktakāni na bhavanti nevāsikehi vaktavyaṃ āyuṣmaṃ āgametha sahitakā piṇḍāye praviśiṣyāmaḥ
T07abhisdhu:2842: atha dāni āgantukā bhikṣū vihāra āgatā bhavanti /
T07abhisdhu:2844: nevāsikehi vaktuṃ o ha he nāvā pañcavarṣikaḍaṃyadukkaṃ śramaṇamātāprajātā tti /
T07abhisdhu:2845: atha khalu āgantukānāṃ ehi svāgataṃ kartta(vya)ṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:2846: etu āyuṣmanto svāgatam āyuṣmanto anurāgatam āyuṣmanto mā śrāntā mā klāntā pādāṃ prakkā(kṣā)letha
T07abhisdhu:2847: hastāṃ nirmmādetha pānīyaṃ pibatha viśramatha nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:2854: mañca pīṭhaṃ bisī catu(ra)śrakaṃ kuccakaṃ bimbohanaṃ (J.121) uddiśitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2856: atha aparejjukāto yadi tāva bāhirakaṃ bhaktaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2864: āgantukā piṇḍāthe(ye) va(ca)riya vihāraṃ āgatā bhavanti /
T07abhisdhu:2869: atha dāni evaṃ pi na bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2870: antamasato yadi tahiṃ kiñci piṇḍacārikaṃ praṇītatarakaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:2882: ni(ne)vāsikāhi dvāraṃ ca bandha(dhi)ya vihārasya paścā vastuke
T07abhisdhu:2884: atha dāni siṃhabhayaṃ vā bhavaṃti vyāghrabhayaṃ vā corabhayaṃ vā (J.122) bhikṣū ca paliguddhakā bhavanti /
T07abhisdhu:2885: cchāyanikā vā lepanikā vā karenti kiṃ vā(cā)pi dvāraṃ ghaṭenti anāpattiḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2889: āyuṣma(ṃ) dvāraṃ bandhiya dvārakoṣṭhakasya upari āsāhi yadi keci āgantukā āgaccheṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:2894: yaṃ kālaṃ te nevāsikā niddhāvitā bhavanti nāpi kṣā(kṣa)mati tehi nevāsi(27a2)kehi vaktuṃ /
T07abhisdhu:2895: āyuṣmaṃ eṣā nāvā mucyati eṣo sādhvo(rtho) prayāto gacchantu āyuṣmanto gataṃ mārggasya śreyo
T07abhisdhu:2897: vasantu āyuṣmanto ramaṃtu āyuṣmanto yadi tāva stūpikena vā kāryeṇa āgatā bhavanti /
T07abhisdhu:2902: yadi koci sārthā(rtho) prayāto bhavati te
T07abhisdhu:2904: upāsaka dānapati ime bhikṣavo tvayā sārddhaṃ gamiṣyanti /
T07abhisdhu:2905: ime bhikṣu tava parininditā bhavantu teṣāṃ gacchamano(mānā)nāṃ pathyadanena vaikalyaṃ karttavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:2906: evaṃ hi (J.123) āgantukehi pratipadyitavyaṃ na pratipadyanti
T07abhisdhu:2910: āgantuko āgato tasya dāni aparo bhikṣuḥ /
T07abhisdhu:2912: so ca apareṇa bhikṣuṇā sārddhaṃ vācovācikāṃ karoti /
T07abhisdhu:2913: so dāni āgantuko allīyatasya nevāsikasya pādāṃ vandanti /
T07abhisdhu:2914: so dāni anya vijñāna samaṃmī na samanvāharati /
T07abhisdhu:2915: na taṃ pratisaṃmodati so dāni apratisaṃmodiya ga(27a5)to
T07abhisdhu:2916: te dāni aparakālena ubhaye samāgatā so dāni sthaviro pṛcchati /
T07abhisdhu:2918: āgatasya āhāre cacciro evacciro ca so āha āyuṣman evacciro tava āgatasya na ca me pādavandako upasaṃkramasi /
T07abhisdhu:2920: vanditā mayā tava pādā tvaṃ ca mama na pratisaṃmodesi /
T07abhisdhu:2926: tadā tava mayā pādā vanditā so dāni āha āyuṣman vācovāciṃ karentasya pādāṃ vandasi /
T07abhisdhu:2928: evaṃ ca yaṃ tvaṃ mama pādāṃ vandintasya na pratisaṃmodesi /
T07abhisdhu:2939: kin ti dāni evaṃ pādā vanditavyā /
T07abhisdhu:2941: eṣo dāni bhikṣu āgantuko āgato bhavati /

T07abhisdhu:2947: praśvāsa(srāva)ṃ karentasya dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādantasya snāyati vā ekanivasano vā bhavati
T07abhisdhu:2950: dvibhūmikam vā ukkasa(ma)ti tvaritaṃ vā ati(bhi)kramati na kṣamati taṃ

T07abhisdhu:2954: cīvarāṇi sīvantasya (I.p.120) raṃjenta(27b2)sya cca(ce)llaparikarmmam vā karentasya pādāṃ dhovantasya hastā nirmmādantasya cetiyaṃ vandantasya pātraṃ nirmmādentasya dhūpam vā pibantasya akṣiṇi vā añjantasya pustakaṃ vācantasya pustakaṃ likhantasya varccakuṭīṃ gacchantasya
T07abhisdhu:2956: atha khalu yaṃ kālaṃ samavasthāye niṣaṇṇo bhavati taṃ velaṃ alīyāṇaṃ śīrṣeṇa pādāṃ vanditavyā

T07abhisdhu:2978: pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayitavyaṃ vihārako uddiśitavyo (27b6) atha dāni gantukāmo
T07abhisdhu:2984: evaṃ pratisaṃmoditavyaṃ na pratipadyati // ābhisamācārikān dharmmān atikrāmati // * //

T07abhisdhu:2987: gṛhi-ālāpena ālāpenti ambe atte bhāva bhaṭṭa tāta haṃgho he he ho (27b7) kiṃ, bhaṇasīti

T07abhisdhu:3079: paśyatha bhaṇe vayaṃ yeva tāva niṣaṇṇā kāryāṇi kāraya nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:3080: ime pi śramaṇakā gacchiyāṇaṃ madhye niṣaṇṇā naṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ kuto imeṣāṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ āhaṃsu /

T07abhisdhu:3087: atha khalu ye tahiṃ vṛddhatarakā kṣatriyā bhavanti /
T07abhisdhu:3090: kṣatriyaparyā(ṣā)ye imaṃ ca kāryaṃ allīyāmi tti /
T07abhisdhu:3091: yadi tāva te jalpanti bhante mā allīpatha nti(tti) na kṣamati allīpituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:3096: cchatreṇa dhāryante upānahāṃhi vā obaddhāhi kṣatriyaparyā(ṣā)yam
T07abhisdhu:3098: atha khalu ekānte cchatraṃ nikṣipiya upānahāyo muṃciya
T07abhisdhu:3103: sukham bhavanto sukhaṃ mārṣa atha khalu ārogyāpiya yādṛśaṃ āsanaṃ dīyati /

T07abhisdhu:3121: brāhmaṇaparyā(ṣā) dāni sannipatitā kāryāṇi kariṣyāmo ti /

T07abhisdhu:3138: paśyatha bhaṇe vayaṃ yeva tāva niṣaṇṇā kāryāṇi kariṣyāmo ti /

T07abhisdhu:3336: āyuṣman sarvve tvaṃ etaṃ kāryaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena saṃvyupaśāntaṃ (30b4) punaḥ karmmāya utkhoṭayasi puno cāsmi parṣa upasaṃkramesi /

T07abhisdhu:3466: gaṇḍī āhatāyaṃ vandi(31b5)ya cetiyaṃ nāpi dāni āraṇyakehi grāmāntikā kutsetavyā bahukṛtyā bahukaraṇīyā jihvāgre yūyaṃ rasāgrāṇi paryeṣatha /
