T07abhisdhu:3709: upacīrṇṇaṃ yo pi so brāhmaṇānāṃ uṣṇodakakarako so pi na evaṃ śucī labhyā khalu ito pānīyaṃ pātuṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3710: sthavireṇa dāni tasya brāhmaṇasya prasannacittasya catvāry āryasatyāni pradarśitāni duḥkham āryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ duḥkhani(34a7)rodham āryasatyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadam āryasatyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3711: tena dāni brāhmaṇena tatraiva sthāne sthitena śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ bhikṣū dāni bhagavantam āhaṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:3712: yasya bhagavān katham ayaṃ brāhmaṇa sthavirasyācāragocareṇa tuṣṭo bhagavān āha /
T07abhisdhu:3713: na etarhi evam anyadāpi eṣo etasya ācāragocareṇa tuṣṭo nyadāpi bhagavan anyadāpi (34b1)
T07abhisdhu:3714: bhikṣavo bhūtapūrvvam bhikṣavo atītam adhvānaṃ etahiṃ ca nagaraṃ (II.p.18) vārāṇasī kāśijanapado
T07abhisdhu:3715: tatra dāni agrakuliko āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāro prabhūtajātarūparajatavittopakaraṇo
T07abhisdhu:3716: tasya dāni eko putro acirajāto so (34b2) dāni mātāpitṛbhir unnīyati varddhīyati /
T07abhisdhu:3717: yaṃ kālaṃ saptavarṣo ṣṭavarṣo vā so dāni mātāpitṝṇāṃ pūrvvotthāyī paścānnipātī priyavādī mana-apavādī
T07abhisdhu:3718: kiṃkarapariśrāvako tasya dāni śreṣṭhikasya kulaputrakā gṛhaṃ ocaranti /
T07abhisdhu:3719: tasya gṛha(ṃ) guptañ ca surakṣitañ ca na pārenti otāraṃ vindanāya /
T07abhisdhu:3720: kadāci dāni so śreṣṭhi aparehiṃ jñātisāle nimantritako gato va(34b3)rṣārātrikaṃ taṃ dāra(ka)ṃ
T07abhisdhu:3721: rakṣapālaṃ thapiyāṇaṃ putra dvāraṃ ghaṭṭiyāṇaṃ rakṣamāṇo āsesi /
T07abhisdhu:3722: so dāni dārako śreṣṭhinā saparivāreṇa gatena gṛhasya dvāraṃ ghaṭṭiyāṇaṃ rakṣamāṇo āsati tehi dāni kulaputrakehi otāro labdho /
T07abhisdhu:3723: te dāni taṃ gṛhaṃ okkhandiyāṇaṃ praviṣṭā te dāni ulkāyo ca dīpikāyo ca prajvāliyāṇaṃ mārgganti
T07abhisdhu:3724: so eko dā(34b4)rako dṛṣṭo te dāni pṛcchanti /
T07abhisdhu:3725: dāraka kahiṃ tumhāṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇṇaṃ vā /
T07abhisdhu:3728: etaṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyakaṃ mārggiya mārggiya yaṃ labhatha taṃ gṛhnatha tehi dāni mārggiya mārggiya prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇṇaṃ gṛhasya madhyamāgāre mahāntaṃ kūṭaṃ kṛtaṃ yo teṣāṃ corasenāpatiḥ so gṛhasya (J.157) madhyāgāre upaviṣṭaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:3733: icchāmi pānīyaṃ pātuṃ so dāni dārako caukṣasamudācāro bhājanaṃ gṛhniya parimārjiya hastāṃ sudhā(dho)tāṃ kṛtvā bhājanaṃ sudhotaṃ kṛtvā udakasya pūriya (II.p.19) yatra dīpā dīpyanti tatra allīno so dāni supratyavekṣitaṃ kariya corasenāpatisya allīno senā(34b6)pati pibāhi tti tenāpi dāni corasenāpatinā tasya dārakasya pānīyaṃ dentasya sarvvam upalakṣitaṃ so dāni pṛcchati haṃgho dāraka kasya kṛtena tvaṃ atra dīpamūlaṃ allīnosi so dāni āha /
T07abhisdhu:3735: mā atra pānīyasmiṃ tṛṇo vā bhave prāṇako vā tena senāpatisya aphāsu bhaveya /
T07abhisdhu:3736: so dāni senāpati tasya ācāragocareṇa tuṣṭo (34b7) tasya bhavati senāpatisya mā tāva mā tāva asmākaṃ tāva eṣo vadhakānāṃ
T07abhisdhu:3737: pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇāṃ arthakāmo hitakāmo ko punarvvādo yo etasya mātāpitā vā jñātikā vā tehi eṣo kathaṃ amaitracitto bhaviṣyati yadi vayam imasya dārakasya evaṃ dharmmiṣṭhasya imaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇṇaṃ harāma praticorehi pi muṣyema grahaṇaṃ pi gacchema /
T07abhisdhu:3739: so dāni (35a1) corasenāpati pānīyaṃ pibiya tāṃ sarvvāṃ corāṃ
T07abhisdhu:3741: ko bhaṇe ko ahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ te dāni āhaṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:3743: bhavanto ahaṃ imasya dārakasya evaṃ ca evaṃ ca ācāragocareṇa tuṣṭo yadi vayaṃ etasya dharmmiṣṭasya etaṃ hiraṇyaṃ (J.158)
T07abhisdhu:3744: suvarṇṇaṃ harema praticorehi vā vayaṃ muṣyema grahaṇaṃ pi gacchema /
T07abhisdhu:3746: yadi yuṣmākaṃ anukūlaṃ (35a2) bhave muñcema vayaṃ etaṃ etasya hiraṇyasuvarṇṇaṃ anyaṃ vayaṃ corayiṣyāmaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:3750: haṃgho dārakā imaṃ vayaṃ tava sarvvaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇṇaṃ demi te dāni corā nirddhāpitāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:3751: tena dārakena dvārāṇi sarvvāṇi ghaṭitāni devatā gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
T07abhisdhu:3755: ācāraṃ śikṣitaṃ śreyo anācāraṃ na śikṣitaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3757: ghātyā bhavanty aghātyācāraṃ śikṣiyāṇaṃ vinayaṃ ca sthāneṣu ca aiśvaryaṃ labhanti ācāraguṇayuktāḥ
T07abhisdhu:3758: vadhyā bhavanty avadhyā ācāraṃ śikṣiyāṇaṃ vinayaṃ ca /
T07abhisdhu:3760: raudrā lohitapāṇī caurā tuṣyanti tāḍṛśā santā /
T07abhisdhu:3763: na brāhmaṇasya prahareya nāsya muṃceya brāhmaṇo /
T07abhisdhu:3764: dhig brāhmaṇasya hantāraṃ taṃ pi dhik yo sya muṃcati //
T07abhisdhu:3766: syād vo bhikṣavo evam asyādanyo sau tena kālena tena samayena ++(35a5) bhavati agrakulikasya putro naitad evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3767: eṣo śāriputro sthaviro anyo so corasenāpati eṣo brāhmaṇo tadāpi etasya eṣo ācāragocareṇa tuṣṭo etarhi pi eṣo sthavirasya ācāragocareṇa tuṣṭo /
T07abhisdhu:3768: eṣo dāni bhikṣu yadā grāmāto nirggato bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:3769: tato grāmapraveśikaṃ cīvaraṃ prasphoṭitvā atyantapari(35a6)karmmaṃ sāharitvā sthapetavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:3771: udakadānaṃ pi ca uṣṭhapayitvā celakhaṇḍena rajo prasphoṭitavyo dakānakaṃ kalācīyaṃ a(ā)varjetvā colakaṃ dhovitvā niṣpiḍitvā upānahā
T07abhisdhu:3772: (II.p.21) nirmmādayitavyā // pe // yāva colakaṃ niṣpiḍitvā thapetavyo /
T07abhisdhu:3773: mā prāṇakā jāyeṃsu (J.160) nīlikāya vā bhaveṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:3775: pādāṃ dhovantena dakṣiṇa(ṇena) hastena udakaṃ āsiṃcitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3776: vāmena hastena pādāṃ dhovitavyā vāmā tāva jaṃghā dhovitavyā dakṣiṇā tāva jaṃghā dhovitavyā
T07abhisdhu:3777: vāmo pādo dhovayitavyo dakṣiṇo pādo dhovayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:3778: upānahāyo prasphoṭitvā saṃpuṭīkṛtvā ekasyopānahāye vaddhro pocchitavyo aparasya vaddhro pocchitavyo
T07abhisdhu:3781: dvitīyasya upānahāye talaṃ pocchitavyaṃ kuṇḍikāto vā karakato vā kalācīye udakaṃ āvarjiya upānahāpocchanakaṃ dhovitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3783: kalācīye udakaṃ āvarjiya hastā dhovitavyā na kṣamati upānahāhi ārdrapādena praveśayituṃ atha khalu yaṃ kālaṃ adhvātā bhavanti /
T07abhisdhu:3787: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇā jhallajhallāye pādāṃ dhovituṃ udakaṃ cchorayi(riya) omuddhikāṃ pādadhovanikāṃ karttuṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3788: atha khalu acchaṭikāṃ karentena pādadhovanikāyāṃ praviśitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3789: yadi tāva koci bhikṣuḥ pūrvvapraviṣṭo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:3792: dhovitā pādā nti(tti) atha dāni khaṇui(khāṇu)kāpādadhovanikā bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:3793: trīṇi vācāyo jalpayita(35b3)vyo(vyā)/yo ko vṛddhatarako vṛddho(ddhe) nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:3796: yaṃ kālaṃ tena pādā dhovitā bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:3798: atha dāni koci vṛddhatarako na bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:3811: nāpi dāni kṣamati tenaiva hastena udakaṃ āsiñcituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3818: vāmo pādo dhovitavyo upānahāyo saṃghā(pu)ṭīkariya ekasya upānahāye vadhro
T07abhisdhu:3823: yadi tahiṃ koci bhikṣu bhavati navatarako so vaktavyo udakaṃ āsiñcihi nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:3831: nāpi dāni (35b7) kṣamati pādadhovanikāyāṃ uddeśaprayuktena vā manasikāraprayuktena vā middhāntaragatena
T07abhisdhu:3833: atha khalu pādehi dhovitehi utthiya gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3835: nāpi dāni kṣamati pādehi dhovitehi dīrghacaṃkramaṃ caṃkramituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3838: atha dāni hemantakālo bhavati bhikṣuḥ paśyati ko bhūyo dhoviṣyatīti /
T07abhisdhu:3839: antamasato leṅkaṭakhaṇḍena (II.p.23) vāmahastena vā āmarjiya praviśitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3846: vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā jīvako kaumārabhṛtyo bha(36a2)gavantaṃ yācati /
T07abhisdhu:3847: anujānātu bhagavān śrāvakānāṃ jentākaṃ vātapittaśleṣmakānāṃ paya(phā)su bhaviṣyati /
T07abhisdhu:3852: saṃghasya dāni jentāko te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvarggikāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:3853: pratikṛtyeva gacchiya jentākaṃ prajvālīya dvāraṃ ghaṭṭiya svedattā āsanti /
T07abhisdhu:3858: āyuṣmanto na tāva (J.163) jentāko tatto bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:3860: taṃ kālaṃ sarvvaṃ tailaṃ upayojiya sarvvaṃ cūrṇṇaṃ upayojiya sarvvaṃ udakaṃ cchoriya sarvvaṃ, kāṣṭhaṃ agnau prakṣipiya jentākaṃ apaduriya nirddhāvitāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:3862: praviśantu āyaṣmanto jentāko tapto (36a4) te dāni bhikṣu śītapraṣṭavyena spṛṣṭāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:3863: tvaritatvaritaṃ praviṣṭā te dāni yaṃ kālaṃ tehi āyuṣmantehi ṣaḍvarggikehi dvāraṃ āghaṭṭiya bāhiravitaṇḍitaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3864: te dāni tailaṃ mārgganti na labhanti cūrṇṇaṃ mārgganti na labhanti /
T07abhisdhu:3873: te dāni hasanti ca vilekṣanti ca /
T07abhisdhu:3875: svedantu āyuṣmanto utpātagaṇḍapiṭakānāṃ vātapittaśleṣmikānāṃ phāsu bhaviṣyati /
T07abhisdhu:3876: te dāni yaṃ kālaṃ dhūmena ca uṣṇena ca suṣṭhu saṃtāpitāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:3877: taṃ velaṃ jentākasya dvāraṃ muktaṃ te dāni uṣṇena ca santāpitāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:3879: labhanti te dāni āhaṃsu stokastokaṃ āyuṣmana mātrāye upanetha udake pi mātrajñatā uktā bhagavatā etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsuḥ /
T07abhisdhu:3887: yāva ete dāni bhikṣū uṣṇena ca dhūmena ca santāpitā nirddhāvitā bāhyato pi udakaṃ mārggayanti
T07abhisdhu:3889: yūyaṃ dāni āhaṃsu stokaṃstokaṃ āyuṣman mātrāye upanetha udake pi mātrajñatā uktā bhagavatā
T07abhisdhu:3894: anekaparyāyeṇa metraṃ kāyakarmma vadāmi (36b1) sabrahmacāriṣu dhruvaṃ pratyupasthāpayitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:3895: āvi caiva raho ca maitraṃ vācākarmmaṃ maitraṃ manokarmmaṃ sabrahmacāriṣu dhruvaṃ pratyupasthāpayitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:3896: āvi caiva raho ca tatra nāma yūyaṃ idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakarmmam akuśalan dharmmam adhyācariṣyatha
T07abhisdhu:3898: evaṃ jentāke pratipadyitavyaṃ kin ti dāni evaṃ snāne pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3900: jentākaṃ karentena vaṭṭito vā karttavyo caturasro vā vidiśaṃ dvāraṃ karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3904: ekāye vātadhā(pā)nīye vīthīye dvauvikā bhavati dvitīyā karttavyā bhūmi astaritavyā upalehi vā pakṣiṭṭikāya vā sudhāmṛttikālepo vā karttavyo /
T07abhisdhu:3908: yena dvārāheṣṭhato viśālāhi upari saṃkṣiptā udvedho nirghu(mu)ṣṭikā trayo hastā karttavyā vistāreṇa ni(r)muṣṭikā vā bhūmito ardhahasta-upastha(sthū)latarikā karttavyā /
T07abhisdhu:3910: yena bhraṣṭikā samantena karttavyaṃ kapāṭaṃ karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3921: yathā ya(ye)va phalamātreṇa lagga bāhirato cīvarakuṭī karttavyā /
T07abhisdhu:3922: nāgadantakavīthī karttavyā yatāyetārthāyaiva bhavati jentākavārikā vā ārāmikā vā (36b5) tehi jentāke santānikā
T07abhisdhu:3928: kuṇḍā jentāke pīṭhikā vā śuktikāyo vā dhovitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:3931: te dāni agni datvā paścād gaṇḍī ākoṭetavyo agnir dātavyo /
T07abhisdhu:3933: na dāni agniṃ datvā paścād gaṇḍī ākoṭetavyā /
T07abhisdhu:3934: atha khalu gaṇḍi ākoṭetvā agnir dātavyo /
T07abhisdhu:3935: mā evam eva kāṣṭhaṃ dahyeya jentākasya gaṇḍī (II.p.26)
T07abhisdhu:3937: kiṃ eṣo jentāko sarvvasāṃghiko pāriveṇiko yathāyo(parṣāye /) yadi tāva paryā(rṣā)ye bhavati
T07abhisdhu:3941: ye tasmiṃ pariveṇikā saṃti tehi ga(36b7)ntavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3942: atha dāni sarvvasāṃghiko bhavati tathā evaṃ snāyantena cīvarakaṃ sāharitvā ekasthāne sthavitavyaṃ loḍhikena vā paṭikāya vā cīvaraṃca(vaṃ)śe vā thapetavyo jentākapīṭhe vā praviśatena na dāni kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:3944: atha khalu ekena hastena agrato praticchāditvā praveṣṭavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3950: vā bhājanāni vā vṛddhatarakaṃ vā bhikṣuṃ laṃghayantena gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3952: yadi dāni upādhyāyo vā ācāryo vā praviṣṭako bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:3954: snāyāmi ācārya snāyāmi upādhyāya nti(tti) atha khalu cīvarakāni sthāpitvā praviśitvā tasya tāva parikarmma karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3957: atha dāni so prakṛtyeva bhaṇito bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:3958: asukasya vā asukasya vā parikarmma kuryesi tti /
T07abhisdhu:3966: parikarmma karentehi na dāni svedena vā malena vā usphoṣetavyo /
T07abhisdhu:3970: vā parikarmma karentena na dāni apūrvvacarimaṃ ubhayabāhā prasāretavyā /
T07abhisdhu:3975: tehi agni(ṃ) prajuhitvā udakaṃ praviśiṣitvā (37a4) udakatamaṃ bandhitvā dvāraṃ pihitvā śālaṃ bandhitvā prahāṇaṃ āsituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:3976: prasvedaṃtehi na dāni kṣamati tailena śoṣayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3978: caṣakena vā karaṇḍikāya vā hastasaṃjñāya vā bhājanakena vā (J.168) dātavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:3982: mānabhaṇḍe vā bhājanena vā hastasaṃjñāya vā piṇḍi(37a5)kam
T07abhisdhu:3991: uṣṇodakaṃ ghaṭena vā kuṇḍena vā tena tathā yeva grahetavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4000: upādhyāyācāryā praviśatha vayam udakam upasthāpayiṣyāmi tti // praveṣṭavyaṃ evaṃ pi kṛtvā mātrāye upanetavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4001: upāsakā vā karmmakarā (vā) ārāmikā vā āhaṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:4004: atha dāni ogho vā puṣkiriṇī vā taḍāgo vā bhavati kiñ cāpi yāvad arthaṃ upanenti /
T07abhisdhu:4008: atha dāni udakasya praticchannaṃ bhavati nābhimātraṃ vā udakaṃ anāpattiḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4011: yathā nābhipraticchannā bhaveya na kṣamati ātmano (J.169) cīvarāṇi gṛhnitvā parasya cīvarehi samākulīkṛtvā sthāpetuṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4015: kim ayaṃ jentāko ekato sāṃghiko parṣāyaṃ pariveṇiko nimantritakānāṃ ti yathā bhavati tathā gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4025: bhante yasyāsti tailaṃ ca cūrṇṇaṃ ca tato āgacchantu nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:4026: tato yasyāsti tailaṃ ca cūrṇṇaṃ ca tehi gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4027: atha dāni bhikṣu jarādurbbalā vā vyādhidurbbalā vā bhavanti /
T07abhisdhu:4030: upādhyāyācāryā āgacchāhi snāhi vayaṃ tailaṃ vāsyāma /
T07abhisdhu:4033: vaktavyaṃ su(sa)gotrīmātā gacchatha yūyaṃ nāhaṃ snāpayiṣyāmi /
T07abhisdhu:4034: atha dāni jentāko sāṃghiko bhavati dāyakadānapatī vā denti gaṇḍī
T07abhisdhu:4045: yadi tāva alpaṃ (37b5) tailaṃ cūrṇṇaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4051: saṃghasaṃvyavahārako vādā(ṃ) nayati vā jalpati visvastā bhadantā snāyantu nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:4052: evaṃ pi kariya tailamātrā jānitavyā navakehi bhikṣūhi sthavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ kāyaparicaryā karttavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4059: atha khalu alpaśabdehi alpanirghoṣehi jentāke snāyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4061: kiñ cāpi praghuṣṭena svareṇa praśnā visarjenti /
T07abhisdhu:4063: yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣū snātā bhavanti jentākavārikena tailaṃ śeṣaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4066: śuktiyo dhoviya praveśayitavyāyo yaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ śeṣaṃ bhavati yathāsthāne sthāpetavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4068: āgacchantu āyuṣmanto vayam etaṃ praveśayiśyāma nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:4070: mā ādīnavam utpādaye jentākaṃ siñciya sanmārjiya
T07abhisdhu:4071: nā(a)ṃgārā(38a1)ni cāpiya jentākaṃ bāhiraghaṭitaṃ kariya gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4077: pañcārthavaśāṃ vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā yāva adrākṣīd bhagavāṃ pañcāhikāṃ (II.p.30) vihāracārikāṃm anucaṃkramanto anuvicaranto vihārakehi bhaṇḍaṃ ujjhitāvakīrṇṇe (38a2)
T07abhisdhu:4078: tiṣṭhati sthālīyo pīṭharikā adhotakā anupaliptā nakūlamūṣikehi ālupyamānā odanamānikāyo hastā kākaśakuntehi nikkhoḍiyantā droṇīyo udvāyo pariyo bhaktapīṭhikā māṇikaṃ caṃgeriyo śuṣyāyo paṭalakāṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4080: kim iyaṃ bhikṣavo bhāṇḍaṃ ujjhitaprakīrṇṇaṃ tiṣṭhati /
T07abhisdhu:4082: (38a3) kin ti dāni evaṃ bhaṇḍe pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4083: etaṃ dāni saṃghasya anugraho bhavati nityapavanā vā uddiśitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4084: māsavāriko vā daśāhavāriko vā tatra uddiśitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:4085: paṃcāhavāriko vā tena saṃghasya anugraho sādhayitavyo bhikṣusaṃgho pariveśāpayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:4086: yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktaṃ bhavati yaṃ tatra bhaṇḍaṃ bhavati lo(38a4)hikā (J.172) vā kaṭāhakā vā sthālī vā piṭharikā
T07abhisdhu:4087: vā māsavārikehi vā pakṣavārikehi vā kalpiyakāraṃ śabdāviya liptopaliptaṃ kariya omuddhikā sthapitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4091: dugdhaghaṭā vā dadhighaṭā vā vyañjanagolakā vā te sudhotāṃ (38a5) suprakṣālitāṃ kārāpayiya
T07abhisdhu:4093: yaṃ kālaṃ śuṣkā bhavati tato kalpiyakuṭiṃ praveśiya sthāpayitavyāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4094: yaṃ tatra bhavati śatapotanako vā tāmrapātrā vā lohapātrā (II.p.31) vā kaṭacchukā vā taddukā vā caṣakā vā palīnakā vā
T07abhisdhu:4095: palīnakā vā nirmmāditā kārāpiya kalpiyakuṭiṃ praveśiya yathāsthāne praveśayitavyāni /
T07abhisdhu:4096: etā bhavanti (38a6) māṇikā vā khāṇukā vā durvvā vā
T07abhisdhu:4097: kaṇḍahastā vā karkkaṭakā vā prasphoṭiya sudhotāṃ suprakṣālitāṃ kariya ātape śoṣayitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4099: tato kīlakehi ollayitvā sthapitavyā yathā na khajjeya /
T07abhisdhu:4100: ukkasiya sthapetavyā ete khajjakacaṃgerīyo vanaphalacaṅgerīyo harītakīcaṅgerīyo vā prasphoḍiya suprakṣālitāṃ kariya ekamante sthapetavyāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4102: (38a7) vastrābharaṇakā vā pariśrāvaṇā vā caturasrakā vā sāharitvā kīṇa(la)kehi ollayitvā sthapayitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4104: etā bhaiṣajyapiṣaṇikā śilā na dāni kārya(ṃ) kṛtvā yathā yeva pratiliptikā sthapetavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4107: oddriṇṇakā vā prala(lu)ggikā vā acaukṣā vā /
T07abhisdhu:4109: atha kha(38b1)lu kālena kālaṃ yadi tāva tṛṇacchannā bhavati tṛṇapulako dātavyo /
T07abhisdhu:4115: evaṃ yat kiñcit saṃghasya bhāṇḍaṃ yo yatra abhiyukto bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4117: ete bhavanti raṅgagolakā vā raṅgaghaṭakā vā raṅgakuṇḍakā vā raṅgakaṭa(ṭā)hakā vā māṣavārikasya vā /
T07abhisdhu:4119: eṣo bhikṣu dhovanikā vā karttukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4121: atha dāni dve janā (II.p.32) yāṃca(caṃ)ratīti tena vṛddhatarakasya jñātavyaṃ atha dāniṃ vṛddhatarakasya cirakālo bhavati navatarakasya itvarakālikaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4123: atha dāni ubhayeṣāṃ itvarakālikaṃ vṛddhatarakasya dātavyaṃ ubhaye(38b3)ṣāṃ
T07abhisdhu:4126: tena dhovanikā vā rajanikā vā kariya na kṣamati tathā yyeva upamakṣitaṃ vā raṃgarakṣitaṃ vā adhotakam vā anupaliptakam vā dayituṃ na kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:4127: atha khalu sudhotaṃ suprakṣālitaṃ suliptaṃ suśuṣkaṃ kariyāṇaṃ cīvararajūṃ na dāni cīvaraṃ raṃjetvā na tathā yeva vitanikā ujjhitvā gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4131: nāsite vā dāni yā vā viśālikā vā sūtrātha olambiko dhovitvā ekānte sthāpetavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4133: kuṭhāro vā vāsīyo vā viharaṇako vā nikhādanako vā aṭṭilā vā ekānte sthapetavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4134: etā bhavanti vāsīyo vā kuddālakā vā niśreṇiyo vā (38b5) na dāni tathā
T07abhisdhu:4139: ma(bhā)ṇḍakaṃ rikta paribhogaṃ na dāni kāryaṃ kṛtvā vihāre gopitvā sthāpetavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4147: bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā (II.p.33) aparehiṃ vihārake saṃbahulā bhikṣū pratisaṃkramati /
T07abhisdhu:4148: so dāni vihārako uppeḍanako aparo ca bhikṣuḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4152: e(38b7)vaṃ bhūmīye patito taṃ dāni ekena ākrāntaṃ dvitīyena ākrāntaṃ tṛtīyenākrāntaṃ sarvvaṃ karddamehi anupraviṣṭaṃ cīvarakoṇako avaśiṣṭo
T07abhisdhu:4153: so dāni aparejjukāto kalyata eva nivāsiya prāvariya cīvarakaṃ mārggati na labhati /
T07abhisdhu:4154: tena dāni mārggantena so cīvarakoṇako dṛṣṭo taṃ dāni tahiṃ cīvarakarṇṇake gṛhniya acchiyaṃ caṭanti saṃca(rvvaṃ) phāṭitaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4160: evaṃ ca tvaṃ bhikṣuḥ cīvarakaṃ cīvarakoṇake gṛhniya acchosi ca caṭanti sarvvaṃ phāṭitaṃ tena hi evaṃ cīvare pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4161: kin ti dāni evaṃ cīvare pratipadyitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:4166: nāpi kṣamati bhikṣūhi muktakaṃ cīvaraṃ sthapayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4167: atha khalu cīvarakāni sasāharitāni kāriya antaramukha duguṇāntaraṃ kariya cīvaravaṃśe sthapetavyāni tato paṭṭikāye vā loḍhakena vā rejjukāye vā bandhitavyāni /
T07abhisdhu:4168: upādhyāyasya (vā) ācāryasya vā cīvaraṃ sāharitvā abhyantara parikarmma dviguṇante /
T07abhisdhu:4170: antarapīḍito na dāni upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya (vā) cīvarehi ātmano cīvaraṃ (II.p.34)
T07abhisdhu:4172: atha khalu ātmano cīvarehi upādhyāyācāryāṇāṃ cīvarā veḍhayitavyāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4174: atha dāni bhikṣu virātrakāle uśvāsa(ccāra)kāro vā praśvāsa(srāva)kāro vā nirddhāvati /
T07abhisdhu:4176: (39a4) cīvarāṇi muṃciya ekaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā tṛtīyam vā
T07abhisdhu:4178: ekena (ā)krāntaṃ dvitīyena ākrāntaṃ tatraiva sarvvaṃ bhūmīye anupraviṣṭo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4179: aparejjukāto bhikṣū kalyato yeva nivāsiya prāvariya cīvarakāṇi mārggati so mārgganto na paśyati
T07abhisdhu:4185: atha khalu tato koṇakāto prabhṛti sukhākaṃ mocayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4186: cīvarakaṃ dhoviya vihārakoṇako (tha)payitavyo taṃ cīvarakaṃ yaṃ kālaṃ śuṣkaṃ bhavati tato paribhuñjayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4188: upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā cīvarāṇi upari sthāpayita(39a6;
T07abhisdhu:4189: atha dāni so uppaṃsulako vihārako bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4190: nāpi kṣamati upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā cīvarakāni upari sthāpayituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:4192: atha khalu upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā heṣṭhe sthapayitavyāni /
T07abhisdhu:4194: nāpi kṣamati grīṣmakā bhavati rajo vātarajo vā ukkani(39a7)kā cīvaraṃ vināśeti nedāni upādhyāyācāryāṇāṃ cīvarakehi ātmano cīvarā veḍhayitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4195: atha khalu ātmano cīvarehi upādhyāyācāryāṇāṃ cīvarā veḍhitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4199: atha khalu kālena kālaṃ siñcitvā sanmārjitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4204: kheṭakaṭāham vā uccārakaṭāhakam vā prasrāvakumbhakaṃ vā saṃkāraṃ vā ujjhituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4209: cikkanaṃ vā apratisaṃskṛtaṃ vā omayilamayilam vā pāṭitavipāṭitam vā /
T07abhisdhu:4231: te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvarggikā kalyata eva vihāracaraṇakāni nivāsanāni nikṣipiyāṇaṃ nagnaprāvṛtā grāmapraveśanikāni nivasanāni mārgganti /
T07abhisdhu:4232: gocarāto nirddhāvitā grāmapraveśanikāni nivāsanāni nikṣipiyāṇaṃ nagnaprāvṛtā vihāracaraṇakāni nivāsa(39b4)kā(nā)ni mārgganti /
T07abhisdhu:4233: ete(taṃ) prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣūhi śrutaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:4238: evaṃ nāma yūyaṃ kalyata eva utthiya vihāracaraṇakāni cīvarakāni nikṣipitvā nagnaprāvṛtāḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4251: atha khalu prakṛtyeva tāva grāmapraveśanakaṃ upahastaṃ karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4252: tato grāmapraveśanaṃ ca nivāsanaṃ āvellayitavyaṃ vihāracaraṇakaṃ nivāsanaṃ uccetalayitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:4253: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhayitvā cīvaravāṇi pravāritvā gocaraṃ praviśitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4254: gocarāto nirddhāvitena nāpi kṣamati (II.p.37) vihāracaraṇaṃ nivāsanaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4256: atha khalu prakṛtyeva tāva vihāracaraṇakaṃ nivasanaṃ upahastaṃ karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4261: snānaśāṭakaṃ vā leṅkaṭakhaṇḍakam vā nivāsi(40a1)ya snātukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4262: nāpi kṣamati nivāsanaṃ nikṣipitvā snānaśāṭakaṃ vā leṅkaṭakhaṇḍakaṃ nivāsayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4264: snānaśāṭikā vā leṅkaṭakhaṇḍakaṃ āveḍhayitavyaṃ nivāsanaṃ uccellayitavyaṃ nāpi kṣamati snānena samānena nivāsanaṃ nivāsayitvā kāmabhoginā yathā uparimeṇa nivāsanasya snānaśāṭikāṃ utkṣipituṃ nāpi kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:4265: he(40a2)ṣṭhena snānaśāṭikām vā leṅkaṭakhaṇḍakam vā osārayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4271: nāpi kṣamati nivāsanaṃ nikṣipitvā nagnaprāvṛtena rātrīprāvaraṇa nivāsinaṃ mārggituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4272: atha khalu pratikṛtyeva tāva rātrīprāvaraṇakaṃ nivāsanaṃ upa(40a3)hastīkarttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4279: te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvarggikā gocarāye prasthitā vihāracaraṇakāni cīvarakā(ni) (II.p.38) nikṣipiya
T07abhisdhu:4281: gocarāto nirddhāvitā grāmapraveśanakāni cīvarāṇi nikṣipitvā ekanivāsanakā vihāracaraṇakāni cīvarakāni mārgganti /
T07abhisdhu:4288: evan nāma yūyaṃ kalyato yeva gocarāya prasthitā /
T07abhisdhu:4289: vihāracaraṇakāni cīvarāṇi nikṣipiya ekanivasanā grāmapraveśanakāni cīvarāṇi mārggatha /
T07abhisdhu:4291: grāmapraveśanikāni cīvarāṇi nikṣipitvā ekanivasanakā vihāracīvarakāni mārggatha /
T07abhisdhu:4299: nāpi kṣamati vihāracaraṇakāni cīvarakāṇi nikṣipiya ekanivasanakena grāmapraveśanikāni cīvarāṇi mārggituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4300: atha khalu pratikṛtyeva tāva grāmapraveśanakaṃ cīvaraṃ upahastaṃ karttavyaṃ prāvarantena
T07abhisdhu:4304: grāmapraveśanakaṃ cīvaraṃ nikṣipitvā ekanivasanakena vihāracaraṇakaṃ cīvaraṃ mārggita(tu)ṃ
T07abhisdhu:4305: atha khalu prakṛte(tye)va tāva vihāracaraṇakaṃ cīvaraṃ upahastīkarttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4313: cchādanikā vā lepanikā vā sammārjanako vā bhikṣu cīvarakāṇāṃ dayārthaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4314: anyaṃ leṅkaṭakhaṇḍaṃ prāvaritukāmo bhavati nāpi kṣamati /
T07abhisdhu:4316: atha khalu prakṛtyeva tāva upahastīkarttavyaṃ ekaṃ ca āvellayitavyaṃ dvitīyaṃ uccellayitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:4322: te dāni āyuṣmanto nandanopanandanā gocaraṃ praviśantā cīvaraṃ kaṃḍhaṃtā praviśanti /
T07abhisdhu:4325: jhāḍe vā vṛ(40b3)kṣaśākhāyām vā lagnaṃ dranti kaḍhanti /
T07abhisdhu:4328: saṃbādharathyāhi sudhāpāṇḍulepanā bhinti(tti)yo ghasantā gacchanti tān api dāni cīvarakāni
T07abhisdhu:4329: omaïlamaïlāṇi pāṭitavipāṭitāni kriyanti teṣān dāni sārddhevihārikā ca antevāsikā ca odhyāyanti
T07abhisdhu:4330: vayaṃ yeca(va) tāva cīvarakāni dhoventā siventā raṃjentā talavilayaṃ gacchāmaḥ (40b4) ime pi na jānanti /
T07abhisdhu:4339: evaṃ nāma yūyaṃ antaraṃ gharaṃ praviśantā cīvarakāni kaḍḍhantā /
T07abhisdhu:4340: gacchatha ta(40b5)d eva sarvvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pratyārocayati /
T07abhisdhu:4341: yuṣmākaṃ sarvve(sārddhe)vihārikā antevāsikā odhyāyanti // vayaṃ yeva tāva cīvarakāni dhovaṃtā sīvantā rañjentā talavilayaṃ (J.184) gacchāmaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4346: tena hi evaṃ antaragharaṃ praviśa(40b6)ntena cīvare pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4347: kin ti dāni evaṃ antaragharaṃ praviśantena cīvare pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4348: nāyaṃ tāva kṣamati bhikṣuṇā antaragharaṃ praviśantena cīvaraṃ kaḍḍhantena praviśituṃ yahiṃ lagnaṃ tahi lagnaṃ yahiṃ pāṭitaṃ tahiṃ pāṭitaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4349: atha khalu yadi tāva grīṣmakālo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4351: sīrṣe vā skandhe vā cīvaraṃ kṛtvā gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4354: yadi tahiṃ ogho vā taḍāgam vā bhavati puṣkiriṇī vā tahiṃ pādāṃ prakṣālitvā cīvaraṃ prāvaritvā gaṇṭhipārśvaṃ ābandhitvā praviśitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4356: patraśākhāya vā tṛṇakehi vā pādā jaṃghā prasphoṭitvā prāvaritvā praveṣṭavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4361: bhrānto vā aśvo bhrānto vā hasti bhrānto vā ratho-aśva vaṭavā cā(vā) ohara
T07abhisdhu:4364: atha dāni bhikṣusya (II.p.41) yatnaṃ karentasya cīvaraṃ dhūlīye pūritaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4369: (J.185) na dāni mā cīva(41a2)raṃ mā kaṇṭakaśākhā nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:4379: bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati vistareṇa ni(41a3)dānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni
T07abhisdhu:4380: āyuṣmanto nandanopanandanā antaragharaṃ praviṣṭā samānā mañcā caryāṇaṃ ca mā(sā)pāśrayā ca dārakadārikehi pādehi
T07abhisdhu:4382: dhūlīya karddamena makṣitaparimakṣitā tehi prajñaptehi upaviṃśa(śaṃ)ti /
T07abhisdhu:4384: sudhāpāṇḍulepanāyo bhittīyo ghasaṃtā upaviṃśa(śaṃ)ti teṣāṃ sarvve(sārddhe)vihāri(41a4)kā
T07abhisdhu:4386: (J.186) vayaṃ yeva tāva cīvarāṇi dhoventā sīventā
T07abhisdhu:4388: ime pi na jānanti kathaṃ antaragharaṃ praviṣṭehi cīvarehi pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4395: bhikṣavo nandanopanandanā evaṃ nāma yūyaṃ antaragharaṃ praviṣṭā samānā dārakadārikāhi mañcañ ca /
T07abhisdhu:4396: pīṭhañ ca trepaśyakā ca pādehi marditavimarditā /
T07abhisdhu:4398: niṣīdatha sudhāpāṇḍulepanāhi bhittīhi ghasaṃtā praviśatha cīvarāṇi vināśayanti yuṣmākaṃ sārddhevihārikā antevāsikā odhyāya(41a6)nti /
T07abhisdhu:4399: paśyatha bhaṇe vayaṃ yeva cīvarakāni dhovantā sīvantā rañjentā talavilayaṃ gacchāmaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4406: kin ti dāni evaṃ antaragharaṃ praviṣṭehi cīvare pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4410: yadi tāva āsanaṃ bhavati dhūlīye vā mrakṣitaṃ karddamena vā vināsitakaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4416: bhaginīyo āsanaṃ prajñapetha mā cīvarakāni vinaśiṣyan ti /
T07abhisdhu:4418: āmilā vā astari(41b1)kā vā kocako vā kalantarako paṭa vā tato niṣīditavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4420: bhikṣusya vā avisrambhakulaṃ bhavati tato ca stūpikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā kāryaṃ adhīnaṃ bhavati
T07abhisdhu:4425: atha dāni evaṃ pi na bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4431: sāpāśrayaṃ vā opāśrayam vā omayilomayilaṃ vā (II.p.43) paṇḍaraṃ vipāṇḍaraṃ apāśrayituṃ
T07abhisdhu:4434: vaktavyaṃ bhaginī prajñapehi kuḍḍasmiṃ yahiṃ apāśra(41b3)yitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4435: yaṃ kālaṃ tahiṃ biṃbohanaṃ vā amilā vā astarikā vā kocako vā śāṭako vā prajñapto bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4439: antamasato saṃkacchikā pi skandhe datvā apāśrayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4443: (41b4) vā tailakhajjakaṃ vā ukkhinakā vā taṇḍulā praticchituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4448: mālyam vā klinnakaṃ cikkanā vā oṣṭhāni nirmādayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4449: labhyā dāni cīvarāntarikāya khakkhaṭāni phalāni gṛhnituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4450: badarāṇi vā kolakāni vā āmalakā(41b5)ni vā hārītakī vā taṇḍulāni vā anokṣīṇakā
T07abhisdhu:4451: vā mālyam vā āklinnakaṃ śimbaṭīyo vā atha dāni bhikṣusya yatnaṃ karentasya cīvaraka karddamena vā nāsitaṃ bhavati dhovitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4459: āyuṣmato nandanasya upanandano nāma bhrātā so dāni tasya sārvve(rddhe)vihārikasyāha (II.p.44)
T07abhisdhu:4461: ahaṃ ca tatra kiñcid eva akalpīyaṃ adhyācariṣyāmi /
T07abhisdhu:4475: te dāni mahāntāni kulāny upasaṃkramanti nimantrīyanti /
T07abhisdhu:4476: ārya bhaktakṛtyaṃ karetha purebhaktikaṃ karetha khajjakaṃ khādatha vanaphalaṃ bhakṣatha /
T07abhisdhu:4477: yathā pratibhānakaṃ karetha so dāni na kahiṃci adhivāsayati /
T07abhisdhu:4478: (42a1) paśyati mā imasya dātavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti yaṃ kālaṃ paśyati naiva eṣo pratibalo piṇḍāya aṇṭhituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4479: na ca pratibalo jetavanaṃ saṃbhāvayituṃ ti /
T07abhisdhu:4481: āyuṣmana gaccha tvaṃ na me tvayā
T07abhisdhu:4482: sārvva(rddha)ṃ phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā ekasyaiva mama phāsu bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4483: so dāni śuṣkena mukhena (J.190) pāṇḍarehi oṣṭhehi tvaritatvaritaṃ nirddhāvati /
T07abhisdhu:4484: kālaṃ nidhyāyamāno so (42a2) dāni tato yeva
T07abhisdhu:4485: anuparivarttiya mahātmehi kulehi ipsitānnāti(ni) bhuktā tasyaiva anupadam
T07abhisdhu:4486: eva nirddhāvito ye dāni bhikṣū jetavanasyārāmadvārakoṣṭhakasamīpe sthāna caṃkramasthānaniṣadyāyogam anuyuktā viharanti /
T07abhisdhu:4488: upaśuṣkena mukhena pāṇḍarehi oṣṭhehi tvaritatvaritaṃ nirddhāvitaṃ kālaṃ nidhyāyantaṃ teṣāṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4490: u(42a3)paśuṣkena mukhena pāṇḍarehi oṣṭhehi tvaritatvaritaṃ nirddhāvati /
T07abhisdhu:4492: te dāni taṃ uccagghanti āyuṣman snigdho khalu te su(mu)khavarṇṇo pilipilāyanti /
T07abhisdhu:4494: yathāpi dāni nagarakulopakena pitṝyakena sārddhaṃ praviṣṭasya ipsitānnāni bhojanāni
T07abhisdhu:4496: āyuṣman kuto me ipsitānnāni bhojanāni bhuktāni evaṃ ca evaṃ cāsmi vipralabdho etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:4498: śabdāpayatha upanandanaṃ so dāni śabdāpito bhagavān āha /
T07abhisdhu:4499: satyaṃ upanandana evaṃ nāma tvaṃ nandanasya
T07abhisdhu:4502: ahaṃ ca tatra kiñci akalpiyaṃ adhyācariṣyāmi // mā khalu kasyaci
T07abhisdhu:4505: tad eva (J.191) sarvvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pratyārocayati /
T07abhisdhu:4507: āyuṣman kuto me ipsitānnāni bhojanāni bhuktāni evaṃ ca evaṃ cāsmi vipralabdho āha /
T07abhisdhu:4510: duṣkṛtaṃ te upanandana tena hi evaṃ pureśramaṇena pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4512: kin ti dāni evaṃ pureśramaṇena pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4515: bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇo praveśituṃ yo na pratibalo tasya ca ātmano ca vṛttiṃ saṃvibhajituṃ
T07abhisdhu:4516: atha khalu yo pratibalo tasya ca (42a7) ātmano ca vṛttiṃ saṃvibhajituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4518: eṣo dāni bhikṣu upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā paścācchramaṇo gacchati /
T07abhisdhu:4519: nāpi kṣamati tena dūraṃ pṛṣṭhato gantuṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4526: anekāye bhrānto vā hasti āgaccheya bhrānto vā aśvo bhrānto vā ratho caṇḍo vā śvāno caṇḍo vā goṇo (II.p.46) āgaccheya nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:4534: upādhyāyo vā ācāryo vā vāmahastikam vā dakṣiṇahastikaṃ vā uccatta nti(tti) /
T07abhisdhu:4535: atha dāni na paśyati hastena gṛhniyāṇaṃ ekato vā ekato vā uccattayitavyo /
T07abhisdhu:4536: eṣo ca dāni bhikṣusya sārddhevihārī vā ante(J.192)vāsī vā paścācchrava(ma)ṇaṃ
T07abhisdhu:4538: yadi tāva pratibalo bhavati tasya ātmano ca vṛttiṃ saṃvibhajayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4543: tathā karttavyaṃ yathā pratibalo bhavati piṇḍapātam vā aṇṭhituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4545: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ śirāṃ vindā(ddhā)payitukāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4546: bāhuśirāṃ vāṅgulyaśirāṃ vā nilāṭiṃ vā yadi tāva pratibalo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4555: yena vā tena sārddhaṃ tenāpi dāni piṇḍacārikaṃ vā aṇṭhiyāṇa vihāraṃ (42b5) vā gacchiya āhāraṃ kṛtvā /
T07abhisdhu:4559: atha khalu bhuktaṃ na bhuktan ti /
T07abhisdhu:4560: anyasya haste pātraṃ datvā tahiṃ gantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4561: yadi tāva na viddhā śirā (II.p.47) bhavati glānasya anu(J.193)kālyaṃ āhāraṃ datvā sahitakehi nirddhāvitavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4562: atha dāni dūragocaro saṃghārāmo bhavati bhikṣusya ātmano (42b6) āhāraparyeṣṭiṃ paryetha(ṣa)māṇasya vikālo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4564: yadi tāva so śirāviddho eva nirddhāvati /
T07abhisdhu:4578: amukena upādhyāyo nimantrito amukena vā antaraghare bhuṃjati /
T07abhisdhu:4579: pureśramaṇo na pratibalo bhavati dakṣiṇām ādiśituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:4581: ādiśa dakṣiṇāṃ na dāni paścācchramaṇena vaktavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4582: yathā yeva agrāsanaṃ agrodakaṃ agrapiṇḍa(43a1)pātaṃ paribhuñjasi tathā yeva
T07abhisdhu:4590: apareṇa dāni bhikṣuṇā bhikṣu adhyeṣṭā āyuṣman icchāmi piṇḍapātaṃ nikkāliyamā(43a2)naṃ so dāni āha /
T07abhisdhu:4591: ānehi pātraṃ so dāni bhikṣu piṇḍapātasya kṛtena praviṣṭo ayaṃ pi deśakālaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ gṛhītvā ārāmacārikāṃ caṃcūryati /
T07abhisdhu:4595: yāva paśyati so vihārakaṃ ghaṭṭitakaṃ, so dāni muhūrttakaṃ āgamiyāṇaṃ yadā nāgacchati (II.p.48) vihārakasya dvāramūle piṇḍapātakaṃ thapiya gato taṃ dāni ā(43a3)ha apareṇa āgacchiyāṇaṃ utkṣiptaṃ so dāni bhikṣuḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4597: idānīṃ pi eṣyati muhūrttaṃ pi eṣyati yāva akālībhūtaṃ te dāni
T07abhisdhu:4598: ka(ga)tyāha(ya)ṃ kālasya ubhaye samāgatā so dāni tasya jalpati /
T07abhisdhu:4599: a(ā)yuṣman sādhu taṃ pātrakaṃ pi labhema /
T07abhisdhu:4601: āyuṣman kasya pātraṃ kuto pātraṃ so dāni ā(43a4)ha /
T07abhisdhu:4602: āyuṣman na tvaṃ māyā adhyeṣṭo icchāmi piṇḍapātaṃ nikkāliyamānaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4604: āyuṣman yadā so mayā piṇḍapātako vihārasya purato nikṣipto /
T07abhisdhu:4606: āyuṣman evaṃ ca tvaṃ śūnyake vihārake pātraṃ nikṣipiya gacchasi /
T07abhisdhu:4608: āyuṣman etaṃ ca tvaṃ mama piṇḍapātanīhāra(43a5)kaṃ adhyeṣitvā adarśanena priyaṃ karesi /
T07abhisdhu:4612: nāyaṃ tāva kṣamati nīhārikapiṇḍapātena piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ adhyeṣitvā adarśanena priyaṃ karttuṃ,
T07abhisdhu:4614: piṇḍapātanīhārakena piṇḍapātam ānayitvā śūnyake vihārake osariya gantuṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4618: etaṃ dāni sarvvasaṃghasya antaraghare nimantraṇam bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4619: bhikṣu jarādurbbalo vā vyādhidurbbalo vā bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4622: vaktavyam āyuṣman icchāmi piṇḍapātaṃ nikkāliyantaṃ ti vaktavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4625: tena adhyeṣṭena samānena duve pātrāṇy ādāya praviśitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4635: yadi tāva denti dve piṇḍapātakā gṛhnitavyā ātmano ca tasya ca śiktaḍḍitakaṃ kṛtvā vihārakaṃ āgantavyaṃ // atha dāni grīṣmo vā varṣārātro vā kālo bhavati cireṇa kālo atikramati /
T07abhisdhu:4639: prakṛtyeva ātmano bhaktato tasya pātraṃ pūretavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4641: atha dāni so dāni patitittiṇo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4645: nāpi dāni adhotakehi hastehi aprayatehi gṛhnitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4652: tena gacchantena kālo nidhyāpayitavyo yadi jānanti /
T07abhisdhu:4655: atha paśyati upakkhaṭo kālo antāntiko na śakyaṃ sakāle saṃbhāvayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4656: mā dāni ubhaye cchinnabhaktā bhaviṣyāma tena (43b4) paribhuñjitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4657: nāpi kṣamati nīhārapiṇḍapātenāpi adhyeṣṭo mayā piṇḍapātanīhārako ti adarśanena priyaṃ, karttuṃ
T07abhisdhu:4658: atha khalu prakṛtyeva tāva dantakāṣṭhaṃ khādayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4661: kuṇḍikāṃ paripūriyāṇaṃ vihārasya prahāṇake dve āsanāni prajñapiya
T07abhisdhu:4663: yaṃ kālaṃ (43b5) āgato bhavati upaviśiyāṇaṃ sahitakehi bhuṃjitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4665: āyuṣman bhuṃja tvaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti cchandayitavyo vaktavyo ūnakaṃ pūrehi yaṃ te rucyati taṃ khādehi yadi tāva ākāṃkṣati /
T07abhisdhu:4670: piṇḍapātanīhārako ca cireṇa āgacchati kālo ca stokāvaśeṣo bhavati (J.197) nīhārakapiṇḍapātena hastā nirmmādiyāṇaṃ pānīyasya kuṇḍikāṃ pūriyāṇaṃ panthe pratyudgacchitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4672: tatra yeva panthāto uccattiyāṇaṃ sahitakehi bhuñjitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4673: atha dāni nīhārakapiṇḍapāto na pratyudgacchati kālo ca atikramati piṇḍapātanīhārakena
T07abhisdhu:4675: atha dāni dūre saṃghārāmo bhavati piṇḍapātanīhārakena yatraiva pānīyaṃ paśyati /
T07abhisdhu:4677: mā dāni vayaṃ ubhayeva bhaktacchedaṃ kariṣyāma evaṃ piṇḍapātahārakena pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4687: naṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ kuto imeṣāṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:4691: kin ti dāni evaṃ piṇḍāye caritavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4692: nāyaṃ tāva kṣamati piṇḍacārikena yā(44a2)va uṭṭhānāto nirghoṭayituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4698: na dāni ito vā ito vā nidhyāyantena āsitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4703: cakṣur anityā yāva mano anityan ti sthātavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4704: eṣa strī dhānyaṃ ohananti yadi tāva kaṇḍikāpūrakam ukkaḍḍhiya occarakaṃ praviśati jānitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:4706: atha dāni parivarttiyāṇaṃ bhūyo nidhyāyati jānitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4710: mudgam vā kalāyām vā dalenti yadi (44a4) tāva śilāpūrakāṃ piṣiyāṇaṃ occarakaṃ praviśati jānitavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:4715: eṣā strī karpāsaṃ kartteti yadi tāvantuka nikṣipiyāṇaṃ uttheti /
T07abhisdhu:4723: atha dāni utthiyāṇaṃ bhūyo upaviśati jānitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4725: eṣā strī bhikṣuṃ paśyiyāṇaṃ occarakaṃ praviśati jānitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4730: eṣā strī kāṃsabhājanaṃ mārjati bhikṣu paśyi(44a6)yāṇaṃ
T07abhisdhu:4733: atha dāni ābharaṇāni vā ucchāreti jānitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4737: śāṭakā vā paṭakā vā hārā vā arddhahārā vā hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇṇam vā na dāni tahiṃ aśabdakarṇṇikāye nirggantavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4740: (44a7) evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ kārmmaṃ cchindiyāṇaṃ occarakaṃ
T07abhisdhu:4746: bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni niśrayakaraṇīyā piṇḍāya caranti
T07abhisdhu:4752: te pi dāni bāhyena bāhyaṃ pratikramanti /
T07abhisdhu:4753: te dāni teṣāṃ upādhyāyācāryā odhyāyanti vayaṃ yyeva tāva imeṣāṃ kṛtena snehaṃ thapemaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4755: jānāma vayaṃ yaṃ kālaṃ āgatā bhaviṣyanti /
T07abhisdhu:4758: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣūhi śrutaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu /
T07abhisdhu:4761: kin ti dāni evaṃ piṇḍacārikena pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4763: nāpi dāni kṣamati piṇḍāya cariyāṇaṃ bāhyena bāhyaṃ pratikramituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:4764: nāpi upādhyāyācāryāṇāṃ vā bhuṃjantānāṃ nedāni uṣṭhihitvā āsitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4769: (II.p.53) khalu piṇḍacāraṃ aṇṭhiyāṇaṃ upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā
T07abhisdhu:4770: yadi tāva labdhaṃ bhavati upādhyāyena vā ācāryeṇa vā saṃgraho karttavyo /
T07abhisdhu:4775: atha dāni upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā pi(44b4)ṇḍapātako bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4776: ayaṃ ca piṇḍāya caritvā āgato bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4778: lūham ca praṇītaṃ ca ekañ ca aparaṃ ca /
T07abhisdhu:4779: atha dāni so praṇītabhojanasya mahārhasya pūraṃ pātraṃ gṛhniyāṇaṃ āgacchati /
T07abhisdhu:4790: vaktavyaṃ suvihita apratigrāhyo eṣo jano mā bhūyo eteṣāṃ tena pratigṛhnīhasi /
T07abhisdhu:4795: tena me eṣo prasannena āhārako dinno vaktavyaṃ suvihita karohi dhūmaṃ mā ca punaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4800: atha dāni na kāṃkṣati vaktavyaṃ suvihita paribhu(ṃ)jāhi tvaṃ nāhaṃ paribhuñjiṣyan ti /
T07abhisdhu:4801: yaṃ kālaṃ upādhyāyena vā ā(44b7)cāryeṇa vā anujñā dinnā bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4805: atha dāni piṇḍacāraṃ aṇṭhitvā tato eva nadīkule vā udupānakule vā puṣkiriṇīkule vā āhāraṃ kṛtvā pātraṃ nirmmādayitvā āgacchati /
T07abhisdhu:4823: (II.p.55) bhagavān śrāvatyāṃ vi(45a2)harati vistarena nidānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni bhikṣū andhakāre prahāṇe upaviṃśa(śaṃ)ti /
T07abhisdhu:4827: āyuṣmanto nandanopanandanā dīpavārikā te dāni prahāṇāto utthitā capeṭikāye dīpaṃ nirvvāpenti
T07abhisdhu:4833: kin ti dāni evaṃ pradīpe pratipadyitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4834: eṣo dāni saṃghārāmo purimaṃ paścimaṃ prahāṇaṃ pratijāgrīyati /
T07abhisdhu:4836: eko vā dvayo vā yattakāvā abhisaṃbhuṇanti navakāntena vā paṭipāṭikāye vā yasya vā prāpuṇati
T07abhisdhu:4837: tehi prakṛtyeva tāva dīpa(45a4)varttikāyo varttitavyāyo dīpakoṭikāni sajjayitavyāni tailaṃ sajjayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4839: tuṣeṇa vā karṣeṇa vā gomayapiṇḍikā vā paṭipaṭikāye sthapetavyā /
T07abhisdhu:4840: yathānupūrvveṇa gaccheya bhaktaśālāyāṃ vā paṭipāṭikāye sthapetavyā
T07abhisdhu:4841: (J.204) dīpavārikena dīpam ādīpentena prathamānam eva bhagavato
T07abhisdhu:4842: śarīraku(45a5)ṭikāyāṃ dīpo ādīpitavyo yadā cetiyaṃ vanditaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4843: tato niṣkāsiya sthapetavyo mā ādīnavaṃ utpādayeṣyā yaṃ kālaṃ prahāṇasya jarjaro āhato bhavati
T07abhisdhu:4844: yadi tāva so dvibhūmikā saṃghārāmo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4846: catuhi prāsādasya koṇe koṇe dīpako pra(45a6)jvālayitavyaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:4849: yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣusaṃgho prahāṇe upaviṣṭo bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4852: yadi tāva koci pracalāyati acchaṭikaṃ kariya utthāpayitavyo vaktavyaṃ āyuṣmana tava dīpo prāpuṇatīti /
T07abhisdhu:4854: atha dāni bhikṣusya upādhyāyo vā ācāryo pracalāyati /
T07abhisdhu:4858: atha khalu so pi acchaṭikāye upasthapetavyo vaktavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4872: atha khalu cittam utpādayitavyaṃ vinīvaraṇaṃ nau karenti tti yaṃ kālaṃ prahāṇasya yathāsukhaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:4875: capeṭikātha(ye) vā mukhavātena vā cīvarako(45b2)ṇena vā dīpaṃ nirvvāpayanta(tu)ṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4876: atha khalu tulikāye nisnehiya dīpavartti okaḍḍhiya kulikātaile nirvvāpayitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:4877: atha dāni navakā bhikṣū prahāṇaśālāyāṃ pratikramanti /

T07abhisdhu:5355: bhagavān samyaksambuddho yadarthaṃ samudāgato tadartham abhisambhāvayitvā śrāvastyāṃ viharati śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pū(49b2)jitaḥ /
T07abhisdhu:5357: cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ tat[ra] ca anupaliptaḥ padmam iva jalena puṇyabhāgiyāṃ satvāṃ puṇyehi niveśayamāno phalabhāgiyān satvāṃ phalehi pratiṣṭhāpayamāno vāsanābhāgīyān satvāna vāsanāyām avasthāpayamāṇo amṛtam analpakena devamanuṣyāṃ saṃvibhajanto prāṇikoṭī (J.225)
T07abhisdhu:5358: ni(49b3)yutaśatasahasrāṇi amṛtam anuprāpayanto anavarāgrajātijarāmaraṇasaṃsārakāntāranarakavidurggān mahāprapātato abhyuddharitvā kṣeme same śive sthale abhaye nirvvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayamāno āvarjayitvā
T07abhisdhu:5360: na-śivi-daśārṇṇa-aśvaki-avanti jñāne dṛṣṭaparākra(49b4)mo svayaṃbhū divyehi vihārehi brāhmehi vihārehi āryehi vihārehi āniṃjyehi vihārehi
T07abhisdhu:5361: sātatyehi vihārehi buddho buddhavihārehi jino jinavihārehi /
T07abhisdhu:5362: jānako jānakavihārehi sarvvajño sarvvajñavihārehi cetovaśiparamapāramiprāptā punar bbuddhā bhagavanto yehi yehi vihārehi ākāṃkṣanti tehi tehi vihārehi viharanti /
T07abhisdhu:5364: auddhatyābhiprāyeṇa śvetamayena saktukāṃ kulmāsāṃ ca mardiyāṇaṃ ātape śoṣayanti /
T07abhisdhu:5371: yaṃ kālaṃ prahāṇasya jarjaro āhato bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:5374: eko tāva pūtivātakarmmaṃ karoti aparo gacchanti /
T07abhisdhu:5377: sādhv āyuṣmaṃ kiṃ etaṃ samvatsarikaṃ pratikarmmaṃ aṣṭaśatenāpi kho vātaṃ na iccheyyā aho manojño śabdo anukūlaṃ karoti /
T07abhisdhu:5380: jighrāyuṣman aho mṛṣṭo gandho aho sobhano ga(49b7)ndho yogācārān bhikṣūn śabdena vyāvahanti
T07abhisdhu:5386: kin ti dāni evaṃ vātakarmme pratipadyita(vya)ṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5389: auddhatyābhi(J.227)prāyeṇa śvetamayena kulmāṣān vā śaktukān vā mardiyāṇaṃ ātape śoṣayitvā śveta(50a1)mayena yeva khādituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5391: bilvāni vā madanaphalāni vā tatkālakāni phalāni khādituṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5392: kalāyaṃ vā satilapallavaṃ vā // atha dāni bhikṣu piṇḍacāram aṇṭhantoparapratibaddhāye jīvikāye śvetamayena kulmāṣān vā
T07abhisdhu:5397: na kṣamati prahāṇam upaviṣṭena auddhatyābhiprāyeṇa vā
T07abhisdhu:5399: atha dāni bhikṣusya prahāṇaśālāyām upaviṣṭasya vātakarmma āgaccati /
T07abhisdhu:5402: saṃprajāna ekaṃ phiccakaṃ utkṣipiyāṇaṃ hastena vivaritvā vātakarmma (II.p.74) karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5403: tathā karttavyaṃ yathā ananta(ri)kaṃ śabdena na vyāvahati /
T07abhisdhu:5406: atha khalu yena navakatarako tena phiccakam utkṣipitavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5407: atha dāni vṛddhatarako ca navakatarako ca ekasthāne ḍhukkakaṃ bhavati /
T07abhisdhu:5408: nāyaṃ kṣamati saṃghanavakena yena saṃghasthaviro tena phiccakaṃ utkṣipituṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:5409: kiñ cāpi yena vṛddhatarako tena phiccakaṃ utkṣipati /
T07abhisdhu:5411: (J.227.16) atha dāni bhikṣu na pāreti saṃprajāna vātakarmma (50a4) karttuṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:5413: atha dāni bhikṣusya puno puno vātakarmma āgacchati /
T07abhisdhu:5415: nāpi kṣamati bhaktāgre (J.228) vā tarpaṇāgre vā auddhatyābhiprāyeṇa vātakarmma karttuṃ,
T07abhisdhu:5416: atha khalu eka pi(phi)ccakaṃ utkṣipiya vātakarmma karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5417: atha dāni bhikṣusya vātakarmma puno āgacchati anantarikasya pātraṃ (50a5) datvā gantavyaṃ
T07abhisdhu:5419: dharmmaśravaṇe vā sāmāyikāyām vā auddhatyābhiprāyeṇa vā phara-pharasya(rāya)
T07abhisdhu:5421: atha khalu ekaṃ phiccakaṃ utkṣipitvā vātakarmma
T07abhisdhu:5423: atha dāni bhikṣusya (J.226.8) puno puno vātakarmma
T07abhisdhu:5427: upādhyāyaṃ vā ācāryam vā āmantrayitvā gantuṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5431: atha khalu ekaṃ phiccakaṃ u(t)kṣipitvā saṃprajānan vātakarmma karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5432: atha dāni bhikṣusya puno puno vātakarmma āgacchati /
T07abhisdhu:5435: upādhyāyasya vā ācāryasya vā vṛddhatarakasya vā agrato auddhatyābhiprāyeṇa pharapharāya vātakarmma karttuṃ, /
T07abhisdhu:5445: na dāni sārthena agrato sthitvā vātakarmma karttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5447: hastena vivaritvā mārggato udvarttitvā saṃprajānaṃ ka(50b1)rttavyaṃ /
T07abhisdhu:5463: (J.230) antaroddānaṃ saṃghasthaviro ca śayyāsana kaṭhina āgantukā ca āraṇyakā nevāsikā ca pradīpo ca saptavarggāḥ prakāśitāḥ // * //
T07abhisdhu:5467: ye dharmmā hetuprabhavā hetun teṣān tathāgato hy avadat /
T07abhisdhu:5468: teṣāñ ca (50b3) yo nirodha evamvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ
